Armigers are difficult to sway from their beliefs. At 2nd level, an armiger gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against charm and compulsion effects. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 fighter levels beyond 2nd.
Additionally, the first time per day armiger fails a saving throw against a charm or compulsion effect, he {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rerolls{/g} the saving throw with the same {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g}.
This replaces bravery.
8ce88466-54a1-4efd-a16a-e36dd7836021: As a barbarian gains levels, she learns to use her rage in new ways. Starting at 2nd level, a barbarian gains a rage power. She gains another rage power for every two levels of barbarian attained after 2nd level. A barbarian gains the benefits of rage powers only while raging, and some of these powers require the barbarian to take an {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} first. Unless otherwise noted, a barbarian cannot select an individual power more than once.
8fefa1bd-cbb4-4032-abc7-d9db50185d21: As a bard advances, they choose additional {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} and abilities that make them more powerful in combat and more useful outside it.
3a37016d-af61-45fd-b036-e8ecc3d70c6f: As a bard gains {g|Encyclopedia:XP}experience{/g}, she learns a number of talents that aid her and confound her foes. At 2nd level, a bard gains a rogue talent, as the rogue class feature of the same name. At 6th level and every 4 levels thereafter, the bard gains an additional rogue talent. A bard cannot select a rogue talent that modifies the sneak attack ability.
fc8133ae-0624-43de-bcc2-c9538cc806ad: As a dragon disciple gains levels in this prestige class, a dragon disciple takes on more and more of his progenitor's physical aspect. At 2nd and 4th levels, a dragon disciple gains a +2 increase to the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} score. These bonuses stack.
638bbfa5-1729-4769-9280-f4fa76b96085: As a forester has no animal companion, the aspects granted by this ability always apply to the forester herself, just as if a normal hunter's companion were dead.
7c8e2a17-be14-4a67-932e-e4c6ba451ce3:
As a full-{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}, you can use a melee weapon to deliver a coup de grace to a {g|Encyclopedia:Helpless}helpless{/g} opponent.
You automatically hit and score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}. If the defender survives the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, they must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacker{/g}'s base attack bonus + melee damage ability modifier + weapon's critical multiplier) or die.
Delivering a coup de grace provokes {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatening{/g} opponents.
You can't deliver a coup de grace against a creature that is immune to critical hits.
11afad6f-799b-47a4-8e21-f371305efb23: As a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}, you can cause a creature's vision to be fraught with shadows and darkness. The creature touched treats all other creatures as if they had {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}, suffering a 20% miss chance on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}. This effect lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
d641f375-25d8-4a95-8aaa-eb71829cd931: As a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}, you can cause a living creature to take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. This effect persists for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1).[LONGSTART] You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.[LONGEND]
4f5253ca-96c2-43ad-968d-a3fd91d5e239: As a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}, you can deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per level to objects or constructs. You can use this ability once per day, plus one time per day for every three levels you possess.
4e5ea548-eedf-42c9-9d92-b6c28092a845: As a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}, you can unleash a ray that causes a target to gain one negative level. The ray has a range of 30 feet. This negative level lasts for a number of minutes equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. Whenever this ability gives a target a negative level, you {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} a number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to your oracle level. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time at 11th level and every four levels thereafter. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
56b43c60-f320-435f-a030-7f6c55a432e0: As a rogue advances, they can choose unique {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special abilities{/g} in addition to the regular {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}, empowering them in combat and making them more useful outside it.
bb6dc70a-6e8b-45e0-a9e1-c892c32c5c68: As a rogue gains {g|Encyclopedia:XP}experience{/g}, she learns a number of talents that aid her and confound her foes. Starting at 2nd level, a rogue gains one rogue talent. She gains an additional rogue talent for every 2 levels of rogue attained after 2nd level. A rogue cannot select an individual talent more than once, unless its description says otherwise.
cd0b50b8-cbd1-4dd0-8aeb-a6951593ccfc: As a skald gains {g|Encyclopedia:XP}experience{/g}, he learns a number of talents that aid him and confound his foes. At 2nd level, a skald gains a rogue talent, as the rogue class feature of the same name. At 7th level and every 5 levels thereafter, the skald gains an additional rogue talent. A skald cannot select a rogue talent that modifies the sneak attack ability.
004710b2-0de1-4cc7-8414-5e0d3c92c601: As a slayer advances, in addition to regular {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} a they can choose unique abilities that make them stronger in battle and define their style of combat.
d2855071-0212-453f-a952-d5e12e192fbd:
As a slayer gains {g|Encyclopedia:XP}experience{/g}, he learns a number of talents that aid him and confound his foes. Starting at 2nd level and every 2 levels thereafter, a slayer gains one slayer talent.
Slayer can take rogue talents as slayer talents, counting his slayer level as rogue level.
After 2nd level, the slayer can select a ranger combat style (such as archery or two-weapon combat) and gains a combat {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} from the first feat list of that style. He can choose feats from his selected combat style, even if he does not have the normal prerequisites. After 6th level, he may select this talent again and add the 6th-level ranger combat feats from his chosen style to the list. After 10th level, he may select this talent again and add the 10th-level ranger combat feats from his chosen style to the list.
cfeeba22-3958-4057-915c-8bc459c5352b: As a stalwart defender gains levels, he augments his defensive stance. Starting at 2nd level, the stalwart defender gains a defensive power. He gains another defensive power for every two levels of stalwart defender attained after 2nd level. The stalwart defender gains the benefits of defensive powers only while in a defensive stance, and some of these powers require him to take an {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} first. Unless otherwise noted, he cannot select an individual power more than once.
a8cbed6b-476a-4640-8d06-99e6108ce150: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}, a Hellknight increases his base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} by 10 feet and gains a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to his {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. If the Hellknight is mounted, these bonuses also apply to his mount.
3555587d-1b9a-4639-9193-26bf1408202a: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}, choose a companion to be a scapegoat.
fcc7b3ca-0810-487a-98c1-1e27f119581b: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}, you can gain increased mobility for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. For the next round, you ignore all difficult terrain and do not take any {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} for moving through it.[LONGSTART] You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.[LONGEND]
b73a246b-0ce5-4979-85a4-587f727b588f: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}, you immediately release the grapple from both yourself and the target.
39aa7f69-f301-4b17-9e7e-69c275493fba:
As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, a student of war can study a foe she can see and attempt a Knowledge {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}check{/g} appropriate to the creature's type. Success grants her a +1 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} against her enemy, which can be applied via one of the following stances (chosen when the {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} is attempted) to the indicated statistics and {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}.
Defensive Stance: The bonus applies to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} and on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}. At 6th level, the student of war gets a +3 bonus to her AC against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
Martial Stance: The bonus applies on attack and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} against the target. At 6th level, the student of war gets a +3 bonus to her {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}Crit{/g} confirmation rolls while in Martial stance.
Tactical Stance: The bonus applies on {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} checks and to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when initiating or defending against combat maneuvers.
A student of war can change her stance as a move {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}. The bonus increases to +2 at 4th level and +3 at 7th level.
At 7th level, the student can use this ability as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} rather than a move action.
79f2dcab-cfa4-4d14-82b8-703482df18eb: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, you can call upon your ancestors to grant you extra bravery in battle. You gain a +1 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, and Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against fear for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus. At 7th level, this bonus increases to +2, and at 14th level this bonus increases to +3. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level, and every five levels thereafter.
b971ab64-bd3e-45b1-a4d2-42199c155d95: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, you can call upon your ancestors to provide council. This advice grants you a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on your next {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d20{/g} roll in the next {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus.
3819062c-8643-40b2-a931-e1f86fd3533e: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, a battle singer can spend 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} of skald performance to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} all enemies in a 15-foot cone, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} per two skald levels ({g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} halves). If an enemy fails its saving throw, it is also staggered for 1 round.
62e7e6b0-1fe2-4f90-b7fe-7f688c1a065a:
As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, a battle singer can spend 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} of skald performance to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} all enemies in a 50-foot radius around the skald, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} per two skald levels ({g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} halves). If an enemy fails its saving throw, it is also stunned for 1 round, and then staggered for 1 round.
If second verse is cast within 2 rounds of first verse, it costs only 1 round of skald performance and is empowered.
7b022564-bde8-45c6-883d-88c3e477391a:
As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, a battle singer can spend 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} of skald performance to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} one enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} per skald level ({g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} halves). If an enemy fails its saving throw, it is also stunned for 1 round and staggered for 1d4+1 rounds. If the saving throw was successful, the target is staggered for 1 round.
If final verse is cast within 2 rounds of first verse, it costs 1 round of skald performance less, is empowered, and the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} increases by 2.
If final verse is cast within 2 rounds of second verse, it costs 1 round of skald performance less, is maximized, and the DC increases by 2.
19cbdb0c-5fd9-4f56-bcef-d5ca86db0f86: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the barbarian heals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of damage + her {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier. For every 4 levels the barbarian has beyond 4th, the amount healed increases by 1d8 (to a maximum of 5d8 at 20th level). This ability can be used only once per day. The barbarian must be at least 4th level to select this rage power.
1da5677a-e622-4fca-b3a3-f4db61a7e9b4: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the ecclesitheurge can bless one ally within close range (30 ft). A blessed ally gains a +2 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, and to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} until the ecclesitheurge's next turn. The ecclesitheurge can expend 1 use of channel energy when activating this ability to increase the duration to a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to the number of dice of his channel energy.
36ace028-1967-4715-b085-35c481e14ebd: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the kinetic knight can spend one use of his resolve to remove the fatigued, shaken, or sickened condition. If the kinetic knight is at least 11th level, he can alternatively remove the exhausted, frightened, nauseated, or staggered condition.
8d34f7d5-6a21-459c-ae93-4e4faf7bb3d8: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the martyr can chant hymns of faith and cause bleeding stigmata to visibly appear on his body; at 7th level, he can manifest stigmata as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, and at 13th level, he can do so as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. He can use this ability a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to (4 + his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier) at 1st level, plus 1 additional round per day for each level beyond 1st. While his stigmata are active, he takes 1 point of bleed {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, which automatically ceases when he ends this ability but otherwise does not relent, even in the face of magical {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} or Heal {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}. His stigmata assist his allies, duplicating inspire courage bardic performance of a bard of his paladin level. At 10th level, he can choose to duplicate the effects of inspire greatness. At 16th level, he can choose to duplicate the effects of inspire heroics.
363f2fcf-1137-4485-b8d1-c5a1f23831e7: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman assumes a form that combines the effects of enlarge person and divine power for 1 minute. The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
a2fa22ee-2752-43b7-968f-b6dbdb9eed5e: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman assumes the form of a Huge air elemental, as if using elemental body IV with a duration of 1 hour per level. The shaman can use this ability once per day.
fce3cb04-b07c-4269-bdb1-0d1dee42d600: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman assumes the form of a Huge earth elemental, as elemental body IV with a duration of 1 hour per level. The shaman can use this ability once per day.
9c8b34ea-1ad0-4039-bb86-2747c99ad2e6: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman assumes the form of a Huge fire elemental, as if using elemental body IV with a duration of 1 hour per level. The shaman can use this ability once per day.
98d29836-3c12-402b-8b2f-7248b71a5920: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman assumes the form of a Huge water elemental, as elemental body IV with a duration of 1 hour per level. The shaman can use this ability once per day.
7c9d1e50-cb0c-4065-a70e-cfea78baff78: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman assumes the form of a smilodon, as beast shape IV. The duration of this transformation is 1 hour per level. The shaman can use this ability once per day.
565595ef-c2e1-4efe-a385-a379e40b7bdb: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman can make a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} infused with negative energy that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point of damage for every 2 shaman levels she possesses. She can instead touch an undead creature to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} it of the same amount of damage. A shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. At 11th level, any weapon that the shaman wields is treated as an unholy weapon.
a600ca51-0fbf-48c8-880e-2ce188e97517: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman can make a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} + 1 point for every 2 shaman levels she possesses. A shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. At 11th level, any weapon she wields is treated as a corrosive weapon.
8de8bd9a-9eb2-41f8-a2f1-5d9b7abd5555: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman can make a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} + 1 point for every 2 shaman levels she possesses. A shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. At 11th level, any weapon she wields is treated as a shocking weapon.
a135ae87-ed60-41f9-83a8-447388722b1f: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman can make a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} + 1 point for every 2 shaman levels she possesses. A shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. At 11th level, any weapon she wields is treated as a flaming weapon.
d2bbfd52-82a6-4cb8-a1d4-0fdbbea976a9: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman can perform a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} that drenches a creature and pushes it away. The opponent takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point for every 2 shaman levels they possess, and the shaman initiates bull rush {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}maneuver{/g} against the target, using her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier for the roll. A shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier.
a67d29e2-a057-4ada-b15c-73b7bcd691c8: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman can shoot razor-sharp icicles at an enemy within 30 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. This barrage deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} + 1 point for every 2 shaman levels she has.
b6ffad5f-fade-4a69-a876-4de75d2f62ab: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman causes a small storm of swirling wind and rain to form around one creature within 30 feet. This storm causes the target to treat all foes as if they had {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}, suffering a 20% miss chance for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} plus 1 round for every 4 shaman levels she possesses. The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. At 11th level, any weapon she wields is treated as a thundering weapon.
226be598-3ca4-4e1c-9db1-63530c830d7b: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the shaman sheds her body and becomes incorporeal. While in this form, all of her weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are considered to have the ghost touch weapon special ability. The shaman can use this ability for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to her shaman level, though those rounds do not need to be consecutive.
80f41b4d-e1b7-441a-aca7-412adbb1b74f: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the stalwart defender {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of damage + his {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier. For every two levels the stalwart defender has attained above 2nd, this healing increases by 1d8, to a maximum of 5d8 at 10th level. This power can be used only once per day and only while in a defensive stance.
24a0ae35-c51e-4233-b5be-fab45da05ce6: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the stalwart defender {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of damage + his {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier.[LONGSTART] For every two levels the stalwart defender has attained above 2nd, this healing increases by 1d8, to a maximum of 5d8 at 10th level. This power can be used only once per day and only while in a defensive stance.[LONGEND]
2a5abdf1-9bd9-478c-aad5-41a0f4cd1200: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can assume the form of a Small fire elemental, as elemental body I. At 9th level, you can assume the form of a Medium fire elemental, as elemental body II. At 11th level, you can assume the form of a Large fire elemental, as elemental body III. At 13th level, you can assume the form of a Huge fire elemental, as elemental body IV. You can use this ability once per day, but the duration is 1 hour/level. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
ca87c166-7cfa-440a-b817-c1e74533aed6: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can become incorporeal and invisible. While in this form, you can move in any direction and through any object (except for those made of force). You remain in this form for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your oracle level. You can use this ability once per day at 11th level, and twice per day at 15th level. You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.
6a3d4055-ca09-4de3-899c-6c31976ae5f5: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can become invisible (as per the invisibility {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}). You can remain invisible for 1 minute per day per oracle level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. Starting at 9th level, each time you activate this ability you can treat it as greater invisibility, though each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} spent this way counts as 1 minute of your normal invisibility duration. You must be at least 3rd level to select this revelation.
2fc134d0-94dc-4e13-a457-781ef142ab05: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can breathe a 30-foot line of electricity. This line deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} per oracle level. A {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} halves this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every five levels thereafter.
4e6ddee5-d5a5-488e-9a0a-4c5e3350b819: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can cause fire to erupt around you. You can create one 20-foot-radius area of fire. ec82e7b5-0b66-40f1-aeb5-98a6252a7f8c: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can create a 10-foot-radius field of protective magic centered on you that lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier. fb448ca4-e71e-49c4-841c-5391c9121f53: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can create a blizzard of snow and ice. You can create a 20-foot-radius storm. 7d956fd6-158f-4489-a0b3-ce87fb865fac: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can create a storm burst targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. ce50f076-d06d-4e12-8f61-963615a6cd2a: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can fire an icicle from your finger, targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. 74399416-5b3a-415a-a302-a0dbb4c49c03: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can make an awesome blow {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}. f06a7e6b-14f3-49f8-b7d2-36808767abf7: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can perform a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} that causes a living creature to become shaken. de5bca35-968d-423d-87fa-d9e3cdd05b55: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can speak an inspiring word to a creature within 30 feet. 1e224ab5-0908-4dca-8132-c31acf262049: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can strike with a telekinetic fist, targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. 14593984-47b8-4145-ac6e-153247d38442: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can touch a creature to give it great strength. 8b08ed36-ae89-4c46-b617-e9e68a57449e: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can touch an ally to grant him your resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for 1 minute. c9387076-9567-4cfe-a377-59386400ce25: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can unleash a 15-foot cone of flame from your mouth. 3d38060b-07c1-4bd0-9e10-5c5c7f2da6ca: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can unleash a force missile that automatically strikes a foe, as magic missile. 10d31fab-981e-4a12-aa58-03d3f3e9fe57: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can unleash a scorching bolt of divine fire from your outstretched hand. 3070a24b-c675-4061-8fce-9edf2934dd54: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can unleash an acid dart targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier. 961a7a3f-dd86-460a-a2d4-28ff54a30b54: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can unleash an acid dart targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. 5b122fc7-4d1b-4903-afa1-abbc9ba142f1: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can unleash an arc of electricity targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. a2b7098a-936f-4f4d-afd5-d5cf7bee5f46: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can unleash an inspiring battlecry. At 10th level, this bonus increases to +2. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and for every five levels thereafter.
2229a136-08be-4466-b4cf-7a4e78caf303: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you charge and throw a pebble that detonates when it strikes a target as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. The pebble has a range increment of 20 feet. Any creature struck by the pebble takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} per two oracle levels you possess (minimum 1d6). Creatures in squares adjacent to the target take half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, or no damage if they make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g}. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g} misses, treat the pebble as a thrown splash weapon to determine where it lands. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every five levels thereafter.
3ff86a2f-94c4-40e6-806f-db2064c7db8d: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you may create a bond between yourself and another creature. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} at the start of your turn, if the bonded creature is wounded for 5 or more {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} below its maximum hit points, it heals 5 hit points and you take 5 hit points of damage. You may have one bond active per oracle level. This bond continues until the bonded creature dies, you die, or the target ends it as an {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
16fe641b-0d7c-4f8b-95a8-6fdedee38ba3: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can enlarge yourself for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, as if you were the target of the enlarge person {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.[LONGSTART] You can use this power a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.[LONGEND]
1d24ae40-3d5b-4c88-8f75-47b5942f93e5: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, choose an enemy to be under the scapegoat effect.
cce69aab-3b8d-4593-a504-79ed8503416f: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, the arcanist can expend 1 point from her arcane reservoir to create a barrier of magic that protects her from harm. This barrier grants the arcanist a number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to her arcanist level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier, and lasts for 1 minute per arcanist level or until all the temporary hit points have been lost. Each additional time per day the arcanist uses this ability, the number of arcane reservoir points she must spend to activate it increases by 1 (up to a maximum of 3). The temporary hit points from this ability do not stack with themselves, but additional uses do cause the total number of temporary hit points and the duration to reset.
b2d89092-bdc0-4932-95fc-458d59c1d0dc: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, the shaman imbues a single weapon she's wielding with the bane weapon special ability, choosing the type of creature affected each time she does. The effect lasts for 1 minute. If the weapon already has the bane weapon special ability of the type chosen, the additional {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt by bane increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g}. The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
cfb33c48-4a92-4835-b3ff-90c6ea9f262d: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, you can cause jagged pieces of stone to explode outward from your body. These shards deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} per two oracle levels (minimum 1d6) to all creatures within a 10-foot burst. A {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} halves this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every five levels thereafter.
14503623-c55a-4cd6-b87b-e41eb92fc42d: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, you can cause waves of heat to radiate from your body. This heat deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} per two oracle levels (minimum 1d4) to all creatures within 10 feet. A {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} halves the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. In addition, your form wavers and blurs, granting you 20% {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} until your next turn. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every five levels thereafter.
985b9e6b-d00d-4098-a591-90f37230e837:
As an instinctual warrior gains levels, she learns to use her rage in new ways. Starting at 4 level, an instinctual warrior gains a rage power. She gains another rage power on 8th, 10th, 12th, 16th, 18th and 20th levels. An instinctual warrior gains the benefits of rage powers only while raging, and some of these powers require the instinctual warrior to take an {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} first. Unless otherwise noted, an instinctual warrior cannot select an individual power more than once.
She also can take additional abilities as rage power which work when an instinctual warrior rages. These abilities are: Diamond Soul, Diamond Body, Deflect Arrows, Perfect Self and Purity of Body.
4fdee392-3d64-4bff-a731-7d1bc29d767e: As he gains levels, a magus learns arcane secrets tailored to his specific way of blending martial puissance and magical skill. Starting at 3rd level, a magus gains one magus arcana. He gains an additional magus arcana for every three levels of magus attained after 3rd level. Unless specifically noted in a magus arcana's description, a magus cannot select a particular magus arcana more than once.
7c78e9ff-22c1-447d-bbb3-2ec95df66bde: As his skin thickens, a dragon disciple takes on more and more of his progenitor's physical aspect. At 1st, 4th, and 7th level, a dragon disciple gains a +1 increase to the character's existing natural armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} (if any). These armor bonuses stack.
62ca761d-aa85-4645-b24e-b5af06b1baa4: As long as he is wielding a weapon from the trained weapon group, the fighter applies his weapon training {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}.
fc107c16-cb3c-493b-a5b9-09ffca4a4b1c: As long as he is wielding a weapon from the trained weapon, the fighter applies his weapon training {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to Reflex {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}.
c72fff3b-a8c5-4137-a3ba-8e53a3872dd7: As long as he wears armor, a 9th-level Hellknight gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion checks{/g}. In addition, while wearing the armor, he gains {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} to fire 30, resistance to acid 10, and resistance to cold 10.
0d951d5a-91f9-49b4-b503-2c627e14b398: As shadow, except it grants a +15 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
19d82e7e-3fa1-4910-8135-91eabafbc3e7:
Asmodeus, also known as "King of Hell", "Master of Witches" and "Prince of Law", is the most powerful of the nine archdevils that inhabit Hell, and the only one of Hell's rulers to claim full divinity. It was he who is credited with the penning the contract of creation, within which his followers believe is hidden the means for their patron's eventual rise to supremacy.
Domains: Evil, Fire, Law, Magic, Trickery.
Favored Weapon: Mace
ae966ad8-a805-48b0-8339-481221b2e1c0: Assassins are proficient with the crossbow, dagger, rapier, shortbow, and shortsword. Assassins are proficient with light armor but not with shields.
021a2924-0ff0-4996-a9e6-5389c214aeb6:
Assassins specialize in poison use. Every day they create special combat poisons, the number of their doses equal to 3 + assassin level, which they can use to envenom their melee weapons. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, an assassin can apply one of the poisons to their melee weapon, and the next successful {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} applies it to the target. {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of all poisons is 10 + assassin level + {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} modifier. If the attack that applied the poison was a sneak attack, the DC is increased by 2. If the target is someone with the Mark of Death, she must make two saving throws when poisoning and choose the worst result.
At 2st level, an assassin has access to poisons that deal 1d4 stat damage to Strength or Dexterity for 4 rounds.
At 3rd level, the duration of the poisons increases by 1 round.
At 4th level, assassin gains access to poison that deals Constitution damage.
At 5th level, an the number of successful saving throws needed to remove the poison increases to 2.
At 6th level, the duration of the poisons increases by 1 round.
At 7th level, an assassin can apply the poisons as a move or a swift action.
At 8th level, the duration of the poisons increases by 1 round.
At 9th level, the number of successful saving throws needed to remove the poison increases to 3.
At 10th level, an assassin's poison target takes poison damage on a success Fortitude save.
863a7afe-c08a-440c-874a-f0cc1e8f117c: At 10th level and every 4 inquisitor levels thereafter, a faith hunter can smite her enemies one additional time per day, to a maximum of four times per day at 18th level.
98a7699a-25f8-4a3c-8e9e-3dbe15b1f696: At 10th level inspire ferocity grants all affected allies the effect of the magic fang {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. In addition, all {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} count as if they were silver and cold iron.
7d87096b-7c3b-4c69-af20-2f81772e6751: At 10th level inspire ferocity grants all affected allies the effect of the magic fang {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. In addition, all {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} count as if they were silver and cold iron.
db4019d5-f539-4f35-8db4-29c2af6a31aa: At 10th level, a Hellknight can grant a weapon he wields one of the following {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special abilities{/g}: axiomatic, flaming burst, or unholy. Additionally, Hellknight becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immune{/g} to fire while wearing armor.
a685e995-5b10-4bd1-b25a-d01db7490b41: At 10th level, a chirurgeon adds breath of life to his formula book as a 4th-level extract. His infused curative ability applies to this extract.
8c2f085d-6e62-41b3-a4be-95d1608cbc93: At 10th level, a dirge bard can use his bardic performance to cause dead bones or bodies to rise up and move or fight at his command. This ability functions like the animate dead {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, but the created skeletons or zombies remain fully animate only as long as the dirge bard continues the performance. Once it stops, any created undead collapse into carrion. Unlike animate dead, dance of the dead does not have the evil descriptor.
bb4049aa-f31c-4d05-af80-d755214610bb: At 10th level, a dragonblood shifter gains a breath weapon of her energy type that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per shifter level within a 30-foot cone. A target can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + half the dragonblood shifter's shifter level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier) to reduce the damage by half. The dragonblood shifter can use her breath weapon a number of times per day equal to half her shifter level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
1ec229bf-204e-4b9e-ae52-d8878510b1d0: At 10th level, a flamewarden adds summon medium fire elemental to his ranger {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} list as a 3rd-level spell.
a1761779-188f-4311-b4fe-685cbe4b336f: At 10th level, a forester can cast breath of life once per day as a {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like ability{/g}. This replaces raise animal companion.
a50099a8-c011-4b5c-8895-d952637dfd77: At 10th level, a grenadier's bombs become particularly overwhelming when they explode. Whenever a grenadier scores a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} with a bomb, the creature directly struck by that bomb is staggered for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}+1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} equals the bomb's Reflex save DC to avoid splash {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}) reduces the duration to 1 round.
d43be910-2f22-43e4-9df0-9f27e41a7054: At 10th level, a hunter gains raise animal companion as a {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like ability{/g}. At 16th level, this functions as resurrection instead of raise dead, but otherwise operates as normal.
46dbc9b0-53cc-491a-a369-882bc921954c: At 10th level, a mad dog gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. At 13th level and every 3 barbarian levels thereafter, this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} reduction rises by 1, to a maximum of DR 4/— at 19th level. A mad dog's war beast gains the same damage reduction as the mad dog.
06b7498d-ce9a-4c40-b54e-42d44fea1b08: At 10th level, a preservationist adds summon nature's ally V to his formula book as a 4th-level extract.
328870c7-d218-4c61-9478-3aa0d6d14218: At 10th level, a scroll savant can use his own {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} instead of the item's caster level when using a scroll.
fcb6ebe1-e687-4a93-b664-15b7f6e9a26b:
At 10th level, a sensei may spend 1 point from his ki pool (as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}) while using advice to provide a single ally within 30 feet with evasion, fast movement, high jump, purity of body, or slow fall.
At 14th level, a sensei may spend 2 points to grant one of the abilities listed above to all allies within 30 feet, or provide improved evasion to a single ally within 30 feet. These abilities function at the sensei's level and last 1 minute.
55f359cf-bda5-429d-a464-f122510b9ba9: At 10th level, a skald can create a sense of growing dread in his enemies, causing them to become shaken. This only affects enemies that are within 50 feet and able to hear the skald's performance. The effect persists for as long as the enemy is within 50 feet and the skald continues his performance. This cannot cause a creature to become frightened or panicked, even if the targets are already shaken from another effect. This is a sonic mind-affecting fear effect, and relies on audible components.
d19a126b-360f-4c58-90ea-282396b1c8d4: At 10th level, a student of war can find weak spots where none should exist. A student of war who uses her know your enemy ability can ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g}.
dd5b81f2-0884-428d-a627-cc3827e940fb: At 10th level, a stygian slayer can transform into an inky black cloud of mist. This functions as incorporeal form, in which slayer can not {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. The slayer can use this ability for a number of minutes per day equal to his level. These minutes need not be consecutive, but must be used in 1-minute increments.
1e745122-667c-47de-a202-2f26189dd64d: At 10th level, a stygian slayer can transform into an inky black cloud of mist. While in this form, he takes no {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from non-magic weapons. He also takes only half damage from any source of damage other than ghost touch, holy, divine or force. The slayer can use this ability for a number of minutes per day equal to his level. These minutes need not be consecutive, but must be used in 1-minute increments.
01671598-ae77-4d0c-971e-f74ae2baf091: At 10th level, a swordlord can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} as an immediate {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} against an opponent who hits the swordlord with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, so long as the attacking creature is within the swordlord's {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g}.
ae56edf1-865f-42de-bfc2-989c7cd26e87: At 10th level, an alchemist becomes completely immune to poison.
c1cfc3ec-4949-4637-b423-4a4cf8bf6f2e: At 10th level, an arcane trickster can add her sneak {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that deals damage, if the targets are {g|Encyclopedia:Flat_Footed}flat-footed{/g}. This additional damage only applies to spells that deal hit point damage, and the additional damage is of the same type as the spell. If the spell allows a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} to negate or halve the damage, it also negates or halves the sneak attack damage.
380307cb-73ee-426c-9d02-6b24c8fe419a:
At 10th level, an executioner can target studied opponents in attempt to instantly kill them. This ability can only be used out of combat and the target must not see the executioner, apart from that its effects are similar to the coup de grace ability.
At 14th level, whenever an executioner kills an enemy with assassinate, all other enemies in a 30-foot radius become demoralized.
At 19th level, whenever an enemy survives an assassinate attempt by an executioner, it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} bleed {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
9a5399f4-fee7-47fd-8e81-06e62ff0d982:
At 10th level, an underground chemist can select one of the following alchemist discoveries in place of a rogue talent: enhance potion, extend potion, mummification, nauseating flesh, preserve organs or spontaneous {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g}. She uses her rogue level as her alchemist level for determining the effects of her discoveries and whether she is able to select one.
This ability alters advanced talents.
18f9e4ad-091f-44fc-8315-4693e5861fc6: At 10th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can become invisible for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} (as greater invisibility).
38c8ec23-9dc2-4d9f-812c-a023a6b63f09: At 10th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can bolster your allies' defenses against chaos. For one {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, all allies within 30 feet gain a +4 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against chaotic opponents.
1e225ae7-f9cb-4d74-8bb0-6cf98d2c2c52: At 10th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can bolster your allies' defenses against evil. For one {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, all allies within 30 feet gain a +4 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against evil opponents.
d9ac21c0-72d7-4b34-a904-15905e13fc01: At 10th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can choose one behavior for all confused creatures within 30 feet to exhibit (as if all creatures {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolled{/g} the same result). This effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
70ae0e8b-adee-4796-82bc-b8a7f6b07108: At 10th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can emit a 30-foot aura that affects all allies with the liberation blessing, allowing them to ignore impediments to their mobility and effects that cause paralysis (as freedom of movement). This effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
7b09bd91-c025-4afb-80e0-ee513fd83889: At 10th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can ignore the movement {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} caused by wearing medium or heavy armor. This effect lasts for 1 minute. During this time, you can add your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against effects that would cause you to become entangled, staggered, or paralyzed.
abb279fc-bcf1-4ab5-8c2c-7176f9e4008a: At 10th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can inspire your allies to follow your lead. For one {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, all allies within 30 feet gain a +4 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}.
84f61418-27e6-4aea-8f3a-fc51526e5f4b:
At 10th level, if the studied target's {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g} is at least two steps away from that of the deliverer, the deliverer's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}; this damage is directly from divine power.
This ability replaces the advanced slayer talent gained at 10th level.
96fecf62-9653-46f6-bed7-abb46d8903b3: At 10th level, ki strike allows the sohei's {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} and any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with weapons for which he has weapon training to be treated as lawful weapons for the purpose of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
37c22017-f66e-4ede-acd5-2f6b23d71b66: At 10th level, the drovier can choose to grant her allies the benefits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} aspect of the bear instead of an animal aspect.
e1a4e7e9-2136-4b22-94bd-cc89c23b7d87: At 10th level, the hagbound becomes exceptionally skilled at cursing others. She can cast bestow curse at will, but its duration becomes 24 hours. Once a creature has been affected by this ability, it is immune to the witch's vile curse ability for 24 hours.
8d0ec381-9753-4626-99c7-4964a42b8189:
At 10th level, the hunt caller's raging song can transform herself and her companions within 15 feet into animalistic shapes, as per beast shape I. The same transformation applies to all targets. By spending 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} of raging song, the hunt caller can affect any number of companions within 15 feet for 1 hour. When in animal form, the hunt caller is treated as able to speak normally for the purpose of using raging song, but not for using other abilities that require speech (such as {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spellcasting{/g}). The skald must continue to perform the song for the remainder of the hour; otherwise, its effects end, but only 1 round of raging song is expended for that hour. Raging song and transformation effect end when battle ends.
At 14th level, the hunt caller can choose the effects of beast shape II. At 18th level, she can choose the effects of beast shape III.
902c9de8-12e6-465f-ae2d-60b09dff36bf: At 10th level, the monk's {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} are treated as lawful weapons for the purpose of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
3e63b590-a4d8-401f-acbc-5e96728cc014: At 10th level, the rageshaper can grow up to a maximum of two {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} categories larger with devastating form; his rage is now treated as greater rage, as the barbarian ability of the same name; and the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} die of his ground slam ability increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d8{/g}.
26c7953e-9f7a-4e98-ab02-1293f066f32b: At 10th level, the spirit warden's familiarity with the dead has filled her with contempt for {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g} itself. She gains a +4 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against death effects.
2925aeaf-919b-4f17-a0c6-2e03639cfc50: At 10th level, the {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} from Aldori swordlord's shatter confidence increases to -2. The target also loses all insight and competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to these {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}.
69974d53-31e1-4cc1-811c-1ca3b65b87c2: At 10th level, when using channel energy to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} living creatures, you can take a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} on that same turn to also deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to undead creatures (as your channel energy ability). Undead take an amount of damage equal to half the amount healed.
3cfd5136-896c-4e6e-a424-a0dfc8eb31b5: At 10th level, whenever an eldritch knight successfully confirms a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, the next {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} he casts within 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} will be cast as {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, as if quickened.
c0b135bc-9faf-4c1c-93d0-4c840fd89050: At 10th level, while wearing his signifer mask, a Hellknight signifer is immune to blindness, gazes and vision-based effects and gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
4fc59cfd-8274-490b-8583-3530d240b75e: At 10th level, with a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} he can recall any single warpriest {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that he has already prepared and cast that day. The spell is prepared again, just as if it had not been cast.
e090be75-925c-485c-8ed8-82e82165ac9c: At 10th level, you can create a barrier of fast winds around yourself for 1 minute. This gives enemy {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attack{/g} a chance to miss equal to twice your warpriest level.
11c8954e-d56c-4185-9658-91d185a78208: At 10th level, you can curse an enemy with unlucky presence. The target of this bad luck must {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} twice and take the worse result. The effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
2623b96c-f84c-48c6-b486-cf7fc9a3781e: At 10th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of protection for 1 minute. You and your allies within this aura gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} 10 against acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic. At 15th level, the energy resistance increases to 20.
3204c819-8770-43d2-b031-6a370570a1f2: At 10th level, you can make a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} against an opponent to deliver grim suffering. If you succeed, you inflict 1 temporary negative level on the target for 1 minute. Alternatively, you can activate this ability as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to make your next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} during the next minute apply the effect. These temporary negative levels stack. You gain no benefit from imposing these negative levels (such as the temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} undead gain from enervation).
71b0c3ec-ca23-4f2d-9121-01ad271a400e: At 10th level, you can place a shroud of darkness around the eyes of one foe within 30 feet. The target must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} or be blinded for 1 minute
42ce4866-013a-4cc1-8ee6-ae054f28e2b3: At 10th level, you can summon a battle companion. This ability functions as summon nature's ally V with a duration of 1 minute. This ability can summon only one animal, regardless of the list used. For every 2 levels beyond 10th, the level of the summon nature's ally {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} increases by 1 (to a maximum of summon nature's ally IX at 18th level).
533cee1a-702a-49ea-8c58-dbd3a7b66306: At 10th level, you can teleport a medium distance as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. You can teleport a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
b4b05c84-4122-4507-808c-b88f6692231a: At 10th level, you can teleport up to 20 feet as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. You must have line of sight to your destination. This teleportation doesn't provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}
ff76d413-a630-4189-a20e-980dc073ce5e: At 10th level, you can touch a weapon and grant it either the flaming or undead bane weapon special ability for 1 minute. If you spend two uses of your blessing when activating this ability, the weapon can have both weapon special abilities.
6b15a0e3-6d06-4a37-b419-3c2eda3d3a84: At 10th level, you can touch an ally and bless them with even greater destructive power. For 1 minute, the ally gains a +4 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} made to confirm {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g} and has a 50% chance to treat any critical hit or sneak attack against it as a normal hit.
1bb59ab0-8643-4716-b4b5-1fe1f60d1e69: At 10th level, you can touch an ally and give her the gift of flight for 1 minute (as Wings). Whenever the ally succeeds at a charge {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, that attack deals an amount of additional {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} equal to your level.
3f2b5e2c-7b3d-44ef-a44f-fb4989341c1d: At 10th level, you can touch an ally and grant them {g|Encyclopedia:Fast_Healing}fast healing{/g} 3 for 1 minute
cf8b94e4-994e-486d-96c4-58aacfeb9101: At 10th level, you can touch an ally and harden its armor or clothing. For 1 minute, the ally gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 1/—. For every 2 levels beyond 10th, this DR increases by 1 (to a maximum of DR 5/— at 18th level). This doesn't stack with any other {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} resistance or reduction.
5bbd0fe2-24bd-4adc-b249-36b400af1ef0: At 10th level, you can touch an ally to wreath them in flames. This gives the ally cold {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} equal to your warpriest level.
00c697dc-a997-4460-af4c-9b44b6d100ae: At 10th level, you can touch any one ally and wreath it in freezing mist. He gains fire {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} equal to your warpriest level.
28bd3945-a6b5-43d3-8868-a29ee1c328b6: At 11th level and every 2 levels thereafter, an arcanist can choose one of the greater exploits in place of an arcanist exploit.
a5bc9182-27f6-46c2-8a1f-4457b765a593: At 11th level, a barbarian's {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} rolls, melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, thrown weapon damage rolls, and Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} while raging increases to +3. In addition, the amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} gained when entering a rage increases to 3 per {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Die{/g}.
0f759d31-fb62-4cbb-bafa-e46135809c0b:
At 11th level, a blood kineticist can drain the vitality from her enemy's blood to restore her own.
If her blast hits (or the enemy fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} against a blast without an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g}) the blood kineticist can activate the kinetic healer utility wild talent without paying the burn cost. This is a 5th-level substance infusion that costs 3 points of burn and can be used with water and blood blasts.
0588cc92-1e0e-4b8b-82d8-97f9cfbe960d: At 11th level, a cavalier learns to make devastating charge {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} while mounted. Double the threat range of any weapons wielded during a charge while mounted. This increase does not stack with other effects that increase the threat range of the weapon. In addition, the cavalier can make a free bull rush and trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} if his charge attack is successful. These free combat maneuvers do not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}.
a7fdc690-0e09-4286-8608-b12d446223f4: At 11th level, a disciple of the pike takes no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} caused by difficult terrain while charging. His movement is still hampered by obstacles, poor visibility, and other conditions. This ability doesn't allow him to move through impassible terrain.
4b4bfc2e-3095-4240-94ec-a0021f009a73: At 11th level, a divine hunter can expend a use of her smite evil ability as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to grant herself and all allies within 10 feet the Deadly Aim, Precise Shot, and Improved Precise Shot {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}, even if they lack the prerequisites. The effects last for 1 minute. Evil creatures gain no benefit from this ability.
639e88a6-b95c-4def-b037-fa29dd3bbf34: At 11th level, a forester learns total expertise over one terrain he has already selected for favorite terrain. When dealing with creatures on that terrain, the forester treats his favored terrain bonus for that terrain as a favored enemy bonus (as the ranger class feature) against those creatures. This bonus overlaps (does not stack with) bonuses gained when fighting a favored enemy. Each terrain dominance grants additional abilities
6b6fe719-f040-4b9d-b3b8-3ef2ddd398c8: At 11th level, a herald of the horn can use his horn to create a devastating shock wave of energy. Once per day, he can sound a note on the horn that functions like a horn of blasting ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + 1/2 the herald of the horn's level + his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus). At 17th level, the herald of the horn can use this ability twice per day and it functions like a greater horn of blasting. Unlike an actual horn of blasting, this ability does not carry the risk of destroying the horn.
dcbe4873-901f-4405-a483-c8e7f39932c1: At 11th level, a hospitaler is immune to death effects. Each ally within 10 feet of her gains a +4 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against death effects. This ability functions only while the paladin is conscious, not if she is {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g} or dead.
9bbaa568-6004-468e-a712-108565d4666c:
At 11th level, a paladin can expend two uses of her smite evil ability to grant the ability to smite evil to all allies for 1 minute, using her bonuses. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, the paladin chooses one target within sight to smite. If this target is evil, the paladin's allies add her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to their {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and add her paladin level to all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} made against the target of her smite. Smite evil attacks automatically bypass any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} the creature might possess.
In addition, while smite evil is in effect, the paladin's allies gain a deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to her Charisma bonus (if any) to their {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against attacks made by the target of this smite. If the paladin targets a creature that is not evil, this smite is wasted with no effect.
609d3614-a857-4a41-bb9c-20fd16a93d66:
At 11th level, a paladin can expend two uses of her smite evil ability to grant the ability to smite evil to all allies for 1 minute, using her bonuses. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, the paladin chooses one target within sight to smite. If this target is evil, the paladin's allies add her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus (if any) to their {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and add her paladin level to all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} made against the target of her smite. Smite evil attacks automatically bypass any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} the creature might possess.
In addition, while smite evil is in effect, the paladin's allies gain a deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to her Charisma bonus (if any) to their {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against attacks made by the target of this smite. If the paladin targets a creature that is not evil, this smite is wasted with no effect. The mark of justice lasts until the paladin selects a new target.
32b6755f-de9b-44f4-8b8b-be24baad3ad7: At 11th level, a purifier can consume a curse, enchantment, or emotion effect by touch as a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}. She can do this a number of times per day equal to her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier, and must make a dispel {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to Charisma modifier against the effect. If the check succeeds, the effect is negated; however, the purifier is sickened for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
b7208685-d213-41b3-bbbe-f70d740a97e8: At 11th level, a standard bearer's banner becomes an even more potent symbol of protection and inspiration to those around him. Once per day, while his banner is displayed, the standard bearer can wave it through the air as a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}, granting all allies within 60 feet temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to 1/2 his cavalier level, and a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} while the temporary hit points last. At 15th level, and every four levels thereafter, this bonus increases by +1 (to a maximum of +4 at 19th level). The temporary hit points last for 10 minutes or until depleted, whichever occurs first.
eb02a2c4-7439-46ae-922a-d643ff004818: At 11th level, a stormwalker can move across the battlefield like a bolt of lightning. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}, he can transform into lightning and move to any unoccupied square within 50 feet without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. He makes a single {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attack{/g} against closest opponent after this movement.
d5321758-382e-414f-92d4-2d153c15ac41: At 11th level, a sword saint can make a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} equal to his {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier (minimum 1). This effect stacks with the Combat Reflexes {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
919c2d14-4be3-49f9-b1fe-9114fba17822: At 11th level, all of the reformed fiend's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} become {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good-aligned{/g}.
3bdd925b-b627-4ee7-9935-d3d95af2e6ab: At 11th level, an inquisitor can use mental and physical resiliency to avoid certain {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}. If she makes a Fortitude or {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} against an attack that has a halved {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} on a successful save, she instead avoids the damage entirely. This ability can only be used if the inquisitor is wearing light armor, medium armor, or no armor.
ea74b612-03b1-4a35-ba3c-e4c058f9c185: At 11th level, an instinctual warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} while raging increases to +3. In addition, the amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} gained when entering a focused rage increases to 3 per {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}hit die{/g}.
0f305ae9-ce40-4547-be60-4786d824447a: At 11th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, a two-handed fighter can make a single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}two-handed{/g} weapon. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} hits, he may make a bull rush or trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} against the target of his attack as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} that does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}.
66716dea-1bb6-4efd-8776-b2a89dd500bc: At 11th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, a two-handed fighter can make a single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}two-handed{/g} weapon. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} hits, he may make a bull rush {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} against the target of his attack as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
e9a719c6-5525-4d54-8f58-fb9e48d68d19: At 11th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, a two-handed fighter can make a single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}two-handed{/g} weapon. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} hits, he may make a trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} against the target of his attack as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
e5d6e10c-e171-4f2b-a726-60d79470e2f9: At 11th level, her claw {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} (1d6 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
40144ad9-a72b-45b0-a34e-f3e66a98ad8a: At 11th level, her spike {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} (1d6 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
97f1949c-0237-4cf6-81fe-ba4b7cbea80e: At 11th level, his slam {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} (1d6 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
15413ad1-affd-4194-8760-b8cdf52446ed: At 11th level, the magus's ability to recall {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} using his arcane pool becomes more efficient. Whenever he recalls a spell with spell recall, he expends a number of points from his arcane pool equal to 1/2 the spell's level (minimum 1).
9b9d3134-ae36-47db-9042-1dd3698b4493: At 11th level, the mount gains the celestial creature simple template.
b1693f54-192d-4a95-8612-3bbbae4fde87: At 11th level, the phantasmal mage can spend 2 points from her arcane reservoir as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} to make the next arcanist Illusion {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} she casts in 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} Persistent or Empowered, as per using the corresponding metamagic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
ead350f7-c74f-4466-bd7e-8ed3b6a1dec3:
At 11th level, when a bloodrager enters a bloodrage, the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to his {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} increases to +3 and the morale bonus on his Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} increases to +3. In addition, upon entering a bloodrage, the bloodrager can cast a bloodrager {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} he knows of 2nd level or lower as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. The spell must have a "Touch" or "Self" range. This use consumes a bloodrager spell slot, as if he had cast the spell; he must have the spell slot available to take advantage of this effect.
Greater bloodrage counts as the barbarian's greater rage ability for the purposes of {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} prerequisites, feat abilities, magic item abilities, and spell effects.
a89142b0-0939-47ab-84fa-e8218d89ad2e: At 11th level, when a demonslayer chooses an evil outsider as his quarry, he can the forgo the normal +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} bonus and instead treat his weapon as if it were {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good-aligned{/g} versus his quarry.
72c386ab-aca0-4e29-a665-2da77e3c032e: At 11th level, when using gather power as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, a kineticist can reduce the total burn cost of a single wild talent by 2 points instead of 1. When using gather power for 1 full {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, she can reduce the burn cost of a single wild talent by 3 points instead of 2.
c1543abb-7cc2-476d-bf9a-0ee80b544331: At 11th level, when using stonestrike, a stonelord's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} gains the construct bane special weapon ability.
df34a8cf-c587-4a45-ab82-ebd55d15173b: At 12th level, a cult leader can use the {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} even while being observed.
701fa1a1-3f2b-4840-b297-68af24206b35:
At 12th level, a flamewarden can use the cleansing power of fire to remove afflictions from his body, mind, and soul. When the flamewarden takes 10 or more points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}, he removes the following conditions: fatigued, shaken, sickened, exhausted, frightened, and nauseated. Additionally, he removes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} and 1d6 points of ability drain from the most {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damaged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} of his choice.
The ranger can use this ability only once each time he takes fire damage, regardless of how much damage it deals over the required amount. He can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + his {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
If the flamewarden has fire {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to fire, fire damage he would have otherwise taken still counts toward activating burning renewal.
60afcce5-f2db-4581-8aac-c56d3b3caf38: At 12th level, a tactical leader can use the tactician ability as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
eae9f7f4-afbf-45bd-95d6-3a1962b59665:
At 12th level, an inquisitor can imbue one of her weapons with the greater bane weapon special ability as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
A greater bane weapon excels against certain foes. Against a designated foe, the weapon's enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is +2 better than its actual bonus. It also deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against such foes.
This ability only functions while the inquisitor wields the weapon. If dropped or taken, the weapon resumes granting this ability if it is returned to the inquisitor before the duration expires.
This ability lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to the inquisitor's level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
999616bc-aa47-4b1c-966d-40b20ba67b0f: At 12th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} once per bloodrage you can empower your {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} with fear. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, creatures you hit with your melee attacks become shaken. Creatures who are already shaken become frightened. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.
874e7b2e-849d-4bd8-a0d9-eaf9d68b9811:
At 12th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, a student of stone can spend 1 ki point to gain tremorsense 15 feet until his next turn.
At 16th level, the range of this tremorsense increases to 30 feet.
Tremorsense: You can perceive the world by creating high-pitched noises and listening to their echoes. This gives you blindsight of equal range.
37b047d1-def3-48e9-a38f-efbd536fbc27: At 12th level, in hands of a quarterstaff master all quarterstaves deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} as if it was two {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} categories larger.
de0514f4-d7eb-4c32-ab7e-5d3e1476fbeb: At 12th level, once per day as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, a champion of the faith can enhance any one sacred weapon with a weapon special ability based on his chosen {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g} (anarchic for chaos, unholy for evil, holy for good, and axiomatic for law). This effect lasts for 1 minute. He can use this ability one additional time per day at 16th and 20th levels.
fe7dff5a-644b-4fa9-9255-94dfe2436d19: At 12th level, the drovier can choose to grant her allies the benefits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} aspect of the stag instead of an animal aspect.
66e07c96-0f8f-492a-b271-8fd5fb6aee7d: At 12th level, the morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} granted by your bloodrage increases by 1, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} becomes –4 instead of –2. At 16th level, this bonus increases by 2 instead. At 20th level, it increases by 3 instead.
58723e0a-3e7a-4eef-815f-6966e7975ede: At 12th level, the nimbus of light grants allies in the area {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} 30 to fire, acid, cold, electricity and sonic energy.
825c0a6f-ea3d-41af-b61f-6f961b07b7c1: At 12th level, when entering a bloodrage you sprout bat-like wings from your back.
7ab02f54-4a73-4809-9c99-d369d5d9fe73: At 12th level, when entering a bloodrage, you grow leathery wings from your back.
ad732799-d053-4781-bdc9-28980910cfb1: At 12th level, when entering a rage, a beastkin berserker can take the form of a Large bear. This functions as beast shape III, except the duration is for as long as the beastkin berserker rages.
b4c2c51e-4b9c-4dc1-84eb-3ace6f17b4b6: At 12th level, whenever a cavalier declares a challenge, his target must pay attention to the threat he poses. As long as the target is within the {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatened area{/g} of the cavalier, it takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made by anyone other than the cavalier.
f5c1325f-2739-43cf-b7db-618b764b8573: At 12th level, whenever a knight of the wall declares a challenge, his target must pay particular attention to him. As long as the target is within the {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatened area{/g} of the cavalier, it takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} against anyone other than the knight of the wall.
9ba0e0a8-3cec-4916-ab25-ac3552f78bda: At 12th level, whenever an inquisitor uses her bane ability, the amount of bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt by the weapon against creatures of the selected type increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g}.
27543930-286d-4718-98e5-cae4186bcef5: At 12th level, while bloodraging you're treated as if you are under the effects of haste.
6dba39f1-4d8c-44bc-8d2e-606170aacf99:
At 12th level, you can empower your next {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} as though using the Empower Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. Empowering costs 2 daily usages of metamagic mastery.
Empower Spell: All variable, numeric effects of an empowered spell are increased by half, including {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}dice{/g} rolls.
{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving throws{/g} and opposed rolls are not affected, nor are spells without random variables.
a3527f01-b1e8-441c-b84d-26514783a5ac: At 12th level, you gain an ability to disrupt enemy casting around you. All enemy casters in 10 feet of you have to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration check{/g} to cast a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}difficulty{/g} 15 + double spell level. You have this ability constantly, even while not bloodraging.
8bc60892-f839-4b74-84f7-41a2f4258751: At 12th level, you sprout feathery wings during bloodrage.
e30b775e-f460-4c1d-a472-ea6f0d8051bd: At 12th level, your sentence ability also makes all your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} ignore the sentenced target's {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}.
