This ability functions as the druid's animal companion, using the bloodrager's level – 4 as his effective druid level. This companion must be one he is capable of riding and suitable as a mount. Whenever a bloodrider is bloodraging, this feral mount gains a +1 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}.
4626c68f-20a7-4ef1-9268-1b4caf0bbc2b:
At 5th level, the dragon disciple gains {g|Encyclopedia:Blindsense}blindsense{/g} with a range of 25 feet. Using non-visual senses the dragon disciple notices things he cannot see. He usually does not need to make {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g} to notice and pinpoint the location of creatures within range of his blindsense ability, provided that he has line of effect to that creature.
Any opponent the dragon disciple cannot see still has total {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} against him, and the dragon disciple still has the normal miss chance when attacking foes that have concealment. A creature with blindsense is still denied its {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from creatures it cannot see. At 10th level, the range of this ability increases to 50 feet.
5f5fe0a6-4cdf-4e73-bcd9-cf0dd3657d54: At 5th level, the phantasmal mage can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} to make the next arcanist Illusion {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} she casts in 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} Extended, Reach or Selective, as per using the corresponding metamagic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
96ffd38c-0845-4b58-b2ae-0225f6317627: At 5th level, when a tower shield specialist employs a tower shield in combat, he does not take the –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} because of the shield's encumbrance.
1e574c7a-2a7f-42cc-b019-6958199b603f:
At 5th level, whenever a kineticist uses one or more infusions with a blast, she reduces the combined burn cost of the infusions by 1. This can't reduce the total cost of the infusions used below 0.
She reduces the burn cost by 1 additional point at 8th, 11th, 14th, 17th, and 20th levels.
bcc702bf-3047-4e4c-b697-0ad9a021cbd7: At 5th level, whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} dancer casts a magus spell, he gains a competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} equal to the spell's level until the beginning of his next turn.
7625c32a-d558-464c-b84d-b9a02c65c5dc: At 5th level, whenever the scroll savant uses a scroll, he calculates the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} for any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} it contains using his {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier, instead of the minimum modifier needed to cast a spell of that level.
d8941185-c8f1-4597-adde-337049160bfb: At 5th level, you gain an insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier on all Lore and Knowledge {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
9d7f968c-1702-4dc0-82a0-d7f8b46e6b53: At 5th, 10th, and 15th levels, a seeker gains a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} from the list:
58828355-3077-4f4a-b4e8-9a21fce8e426: At 6th level and every 3 levels thereafter, the urban hunter selects a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} from the following list to be gained by both the hunter and her animal companion. Neither the hunter nor her animal companion needs to meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
60d92eec-b702-47eb-ac4d-698eb7e3d48c: At 6th level, a Hellknight signifer gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} of Illusion school.
9de4eee0-8f9a-4571-bf6b-785248cb2e20:
At 6th level, a bard can use his performance to cause one or more creatures to become fascinated with him. Each creature to be fascinated must be within 30 feet.
Each creature within range receives a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + 1/2 the bard's level + the bard's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Cha{/g} modifier) to negate the effect. If a creature's saving throw succeeds, the bard cannot attempt to fascinate that creature again for 24 hours. If its saving throw fails, the creature stands quietly and observes the performance for as long as the bard continues to maintain it. Any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to the target automatically breaks the effect.
a6ac664f-1037-47a9-8197-d279a9ecd5cb: At 6th level, a court poet can use raging song to inspire her allies to greater mental clarity. Once each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} while the court poet uses this performance, allies within 30 feet who can hear her can add half her skald level to all {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
d7245acc-02e0-44a0-9582-f9ba5652fda5: At 6th level, a deathtouched companion gains a +4 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on Fortitude {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against effects that could not normally affect objects or undead.
6bfff7a8-58d5-497c-805c-9f652116cf03: At 6th level, a disenchanter learns to focus his mystic interference. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, he can consume two uses of his fervor ability to target a single creature within 30 feet with a targeted dispel magic.
3c4cd8dd-e34a-4e8b-b3a4-d03e2a8571ac:
At 6th level, a divine hunter can expend two uses of her lay on hands ability to use her lay on hands ability on a target within 5 feet per paladin level.
A paladin can {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} the wounds of others by touch. With one use of this ability, a paladin can heal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} of damage for every two paladin levels she possesses. Using this ability is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}.
Alternatively, a paladin can use this healing power to deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to undead creatures, dealing 1d6 points of damage for every two levels the paladin possesses. Using lay on hands in this way requires a successful melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} and doesn't provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}. Undead do not receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} against this damage.
b36b93d6-fcd4-4e48-9c84-4cb1f72ffe0a: At 6th level, a duelist movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is no longer reduced on difficult terrain. Depending on the circumstance, she may still need to make appropriate {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to successfully move over the terrain.
4f72da26-b89d-4b88-a6c3-fa0733df9758: At 6th level, a greenrager's magic unlocks the secrets of summoning allies from nature. He adds summon nature's ally I to his list of 1st-level bloodrager {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} known as a bonus spell, as if it were a bonus bloodrager spell. At 7th level, he adds summon nature's ally II as a bonus 2nd-level bloodrager spell, at 10th level he adds summon nature's ally III as a bonus 3rd level bloodrager spell, and at 13th level he adds summon nature's ally IV as a bonus 4th-level bloodrager spell.
8343b94e-fbbf-44af-a79b-ba5680f826f9: At 6th level, a grenadier can detonate a bomb so that it splashes in a 30-foot cone rather than affecting a radius. The cone starts at the alchemist and extends away from her in the direction she chooses. Each creature within the cone takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} as if it had suffered a direct hit from the alchemist's bomb, but succeeding at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + 1/2 the alchemist's level + the alchemist's {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier) halves the damage.
1acb2d44-0c96-48d6-8d03-fe99fae9d4a2: At 6th level, a loremaster gains the ability to understand magic items. Whenever a loremaster examines a magic item to determine its properties, he gains a +10 circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on his {g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_Arcana}Knowledge (arcana){/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g}.
c377e4e7-b682-4c1e-aa25-9e2129320858: At 6th level, a possessed shaman is able to make room for another spirit. Once per day, the possessed shaman chooses one {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}. The possessed shaman treats this skill as if she had a number of ranks in it equal to her shaman level, and uses her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier in place of the ability modifier the skill would normally use. These ranks do not stack with her other skill ranks (only the higher number of ranks applies).
feb1547b-8519-4331-aafd-96afaa395303:
At 6th level, a sensei may use his advice ability when spending points from his ki pool to activate a class ability (using the normal {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g} required for each) in order to have that ability affect one ally within 30 feet rather than the sensei himself.
At 10th level, a sensei may affect all allies within 30 feet rather than himself (spending points from his ki pool only once, not once for each target).
3c873367-ad3d-4cdb-9a6c-9c23b1875911: At 6th level, a shaman can temporarily gain the use of one of the hexes possessed by either one of her spirits. She must make this selection each day when she prepares her {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. For the purposes of this ability, she can select any hex possessed by her spirit or wandering spirit. If she selects it from her wandering spirit, she loses the hex immediately if she bonds with another spirit, although she can then select a different hex to gain using this ability, from either her spirit or her new wandering spirit. At 14th level, a shaman can select two wandering hexes each day instead of one. This ability otherwise functions as the hex class feature.
c75a9e6c-31eb-42f8-80e0-0d5e182b343d: At 6th level, a shifter gains the ability to make several ferocious {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with the same {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapon{/g}. Instead of attacking with all her natural weapons, the shifter can choose a single natural weapon and make a full attack with that natural weapon, gaining a second iterative attack at a -5 as if it was a manufactured weapon. When she does so, all her other natural attacks count as secondary attacks and do not benefit from shifter claws (the second attack with her shifter claws in her humanoid form counts as secondary but does not lose any shifter claws bonuses). The number of additional attacks increases with the shifter's {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} (she gains another iterative attack at a -10 when her BAB reaches +11 and so on).
46bf6476-ab68-4daa-b13e-2c05577e74be: At 6th level, a skald can use raging song to inspire his allies to superhuman feats of strength. While the skald uses this performance, allies within 50 feet who can hear the skald may add 1/2 the skald's level to all {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
a35f6850-ab47-45d1-8d65-75b05eecba09: At 6th level, a sohei gains weapon training in one of the following weapon groups, as the fighter class feature: bows, crossbows, monk weapons, polearms, spears, or thrown weapons. He may select an additional group of weapons for every six levels after 6th, to a maximum of three at 18th level. A sohei may use flurry of blows and ki strike with any weapon in which he has weapon training.
34d18944-57d1-46ac-a48a-ffd704ead835:
At 6th level, a student of stone adds Elemental Fist to his list of available bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}. If the student of stone selects Elemental Fist as a bonus feat, he may only deal {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} when using the feat.
At 10th level, the student of stone adds Shaitan Style to his list of bonus feats.
At 14th level, he adds Shaitan Skin.
At 18th level, he adds Shaitan Earthblast.
139a0007-8e51-4c7b-affa-6b4ba21f8bfa: At 6th level, a student of war can aim her blows at the weakest point in a studied foe's defense, ignoring up to 5 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. This does not apply to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} reduction without a type (such as DR 10/-). This ability cannot be used against creatures that are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g} or otherwise lack discernible weak points.
161de72f-e047-4f5f-9b9a-3437bd11af2d: At 6th level, a wild effigy can sacrifice minutes from her aspects' minor forms to turn her claws into adamantine. By expending a 1-minute increment of her shifter's minor aspect ability as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, she can grant her shifter claws the ability to ignore an amount of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} or hardness equal to her shifter level for 1 minute.
497bfc8e-14f7-4e0b-9a39-99312ca0e0ca: At 6th level, all of your {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} are treated as if they were empowered, increasing the amount of damage healed by half (+50%). This does not apply to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt to undead with a cure spell. This does not stack with the Empower Spell metamagic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
d91580ad-ecfa-4735-b816-692ea3920c35: At 6th level, an archaeologist can always take 10 on {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery checks{/g}. A bard can choose not to take 10 and can instead {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} normally.
ff1aee0c-ceae-4f9f-8c08-74653daa40df: At 6th level, an overwhelming mage gains the ability to sacrifice a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} slot of 3rd level or higher to increase the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of the next spell he casts during the next two {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, equal to one third of the sacrificed spell level.
6064c5d3-f5c2-4740-b065-59749777d76a: At 6th level, and at every six levels thereafter, a cavalier gains a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} in addition to those gained from normal advancement. These bonus feats must be selected from those listed as combat feats. The cavalier must meet the prerequisites of these bonus feats.
4214ee2a-8fa8-486c-8117-27a43aaf63a2:
At 6th level, once per day as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, a faith hunter can smite one foe she can see. If the foe is of the faith hunter's sworn enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}, the faith hunter gains a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} against that foe and a bonus equal to half her inquisitor level on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} made against the foe. Smites against targets of the faith hunter's sworn enemy alignment automatically bypass any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} the creature might possess. If the faith hunter targets a creature that is not of her sworn enemy alignment, the smite is wasted with no effect.
The smite effect remains until the foe is dead or the next time the faith hunter rests and regains her uses of this ability. At 10th level and every 4 inquisitor levels thereafter, a faith hunter can smite her enemies one additional time per day, to a maximum of four times per day at 18th level.
3ed604b5-13d1-4e38-bf82-caba98013ecc:
At 6th level, once per day, she can reduce the total burn cost of any wild talent by 1.
She can use this ability an additional time per day at 10th level and every 4 levels thereafter.
8bf2b774-b955-4ecd-a20a-8d70c4b034f0: At 6th level, the dragonheir scion receives Dazzling Display as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. She does not need a weapon in hand to use this ability, and can use it as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}.
0d1c4e71-d6a7-4474-a8d2-38966ba0db87: At 6th level, the drovier's communal aspect ability grants the benefits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} greater animal aspect.
9a4d69e8-b4c3-48a8-99ca-7e23464d3527: At 6th level, the hunt caller gains the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} rage power. Her song of the senses and inspired rage raging songs both grant affected allies this rage power.
583adaa2-1378-4eed-b63d-279e670af599: At 6th level, the student of war gets a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to her {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} while in defensive stance.
39abe5a5-2ea3-4dc5-b474-eac9497d73f4:
At 6th level, the thundercaller can induce a furious rage in all allies within 30 feet. This effect functions as the rage {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} and lasts as long as the target can hear the thundercaller's performance. Unwilling creatures can be affected if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + 1/2 the thundercaller's level + the thundercaller's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier).
Success renders the target immune to this power for 24 hours. The thundercaller cannot target herself with this ability.
Each affected creature gains a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +1 morale bonus on Will saves, a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, and cannot cast spells.
fdcee8cf-2c8d-49a7-b10e-3ef0cbd9bf6e:
At 6th level, the thundercaller can induce a furious rage in all creatures within 30 feet. This effect functions as the rage {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} and lasts as long as the target can hear the thundercaller's performance. Unwilling creatures can be affected if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + 1/2 the thundercaller's level + the thundercaller's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier).
Success renders the target immune to this power for 24 hours. The thundercaller cannot target herself with this ability.
Each affected creature gains a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +1 morale bonus on Will saves, a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, and cannot cast spells.
97ef1f19-df04-4dc7-a5ed-cf572afaa0c7:
At 6th level, the thundercaller can induce a furious rage in all enemies within 30 feet. This effect functions as the rage {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} and lasts as long as the target can hear the thundercaller's performance. Unwilling creatures can be affected if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + 1/2 the thundercaller's level + the thundercaller's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier).
Success renders the target immune to this power for 24 hours. The thundercaller cannot target herself with this ability.
Each affected creature gains a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +1 morale bonus on Will saves, a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, and cannot cast spells.
c7e24190-79df-4c9d-83bc-aad27e61dcb5: At 6th level, when a swordlord successfully disarms an opponent using a dueling sword, the swordlord also deals normal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to the target, but without the normal {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} bonus to damage.
a16f1a70-0621-4497-9c94-da4dfa914a2c: At 6th level, when wielding a dueling sword, an Aldori swordlord can try deflecting a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} targeting him, reducing its {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to that of a normal hit, with a 25% chance of success. This does not stack with the fortification special ability of magical armor or similar effects.
41ef68e6-6400-40e4-a052-b76ee9ba319a: At 6th level, whenever the animal companion is 10 feet or more away from the hunter, it gets a morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} equal to +1 for every 4 levels the hunter has.
8309630e-057f-4e1d-a6df-90bf3c2cb85a: At 6th level, you can call on your deity to give you unnatural luck. This ability functions like Bit of Luck, but it affects you and lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain.
8bafe2a0-c023-4904-8ef2-8ba89ed0312c: At 6th level, you can cause a host of wooden thorns to burst from your skin as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. While bramble armor is in effect, any foe striking you with a melee weapon without {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} + 1 point per two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain.[LONGSTART] You can use this ability for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.[LONGEND]
b22a275c-0b57-4733-8c92-02bcf302f004: At 6th level, you gain an amount of energy absorption equal to 3 times your wizard level per day. Whenever you take {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}energy damage{/g} apply the rest to this absorption, reducing your daily total by that amount. Any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} in excess of your absorption is applied to you normally.
82ee1916-717b-4fda-93bb-76dc404e613e: At 6th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} acid 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to acid.
7b847bca-abd6-4a8e-b3e0-34daca66e3f2: At 6th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} cold 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to cold.
ced5f1e6-ec6c-4342-ae2e-b0b6989350d9: At 6th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} electricity 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to electricity.
bfef7c16-25e1-44e1-a6e6-665bc0566677: At 6th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} fire 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to fire.
a1fc8a6a-6bbc-4deb-82d0-eaebde15fe3e: At 7th level and every 4 levels thereafter, the mutation warrior can choose one of the following alchemist discoveries to augment his abilities: feral mutagen, grand mutagen, greater mutagen, nauseating flesh, preserve organs, spontaneous healing, feral wings. The mutation warrior uses his fighter level as his effective alchemist level for the purpose of these discoveries.
2e6f06a0-1c4a-4b8d-af07-85a0aff244bf: At 7th level and higher, if a duelist chooses to fight defensively in melee combat, she gains an additional +1 dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} for every 3 levels of duelist she has attained.
77fd9904-e90a-4f85-9523-fd4338adefb7: At 7th level, a Hellknight's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are treated as being lawful for the purpose of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
3c99a4f3-da63-4ff8-b2ab-e281e205de36: At 7th level, a barbarian gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. Subtract 1 from the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} the barbarian takes each time she is dealt damage from a weapon or a {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attack{/g}. At 10th level, and every three barbarian levels thereafter (13th, 16th, and 19th level), this damage reduction rises by 1 point. Damage reduction can reduce damage to 0 but not below 0.
5cc20cdc-8ec9-4aaa-aa92-51e89755b337: At 7th level, a bard can start a bardic performance as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} instead of a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}.
ea102d9d-7796-4b18-9106-149268aa88f7: At 7th level, a bloodrager gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. Subtract 1 from the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} the bloodrager takes each time he is dealt damage from a weapon or a {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attack{/g}. At 10th level, and every 3 levels thereafter, this damage reduction increases by 1 point. Damage Reduction can reduce damage to 0, but not below 0.
51ebbaa1-2970-4b05-a91d-b0e2a276d77c: At 7th level, a dragon disciple can assume the form of a dragon. This ability works like dragonkind I {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. At 10th level, this ability functions as dragonkind II spell, and the dragon disciple can use this ability twice per day. His {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} for this effect is equal to his effective sorcerer levels for his draconic bloodline.
fc98534f-0856-4002-9a54-e6ecf9737e9b: At 7th level, a feral champion gains wild shape, as the druid ability of the same name, and treats his warpriest level minus 3 as his effective druid level for the purposes of this ability. However, a feral champion does not gain the ability to take on elemental or plant forms with wild shape. A feral champion can use wild shape once per day at 7th level and one additional time per day every 4 levels thereafter, for a total of four times per day at 19th level.
35b9365b-da4f-4872-a592-364f0256677b: At 7th level, a flamewarden adds scorching ray to his list ranger {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} list as a 2nd-level spell.
ce75f60c-a2f8-40d6-9839-466854b5e98b:
At 7th level, a forester can use the {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} to hide in any of her favored terrains, even if the terrain doesn't grant cover or {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}.
This replaces bonus tricks.
3b4ba887-80b2-4c4d-bc60-725740a4f924: At 7th level, a herald's horn enhances his sonic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. If a skald spell with the sonic descriptor is cast using the horn, its {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} increases by 1. These DCs increase by an additional 1 at 13th and 19th levels.
6c2ee053-524d-4bde-8385-b090fb74f375:
At 7th level, a kineticist learns to use another element or expands her understanding of her own element. She can choose any element, including her primary element. She gains one of that element's simple blast wild talents that she does not already possess, if any. She also gains all composite blast wild talents whose prerequisites she meets. She doesn't gain the defensive wild talent of the expanded element unless she later selects it with the expanded defense utility wild talent.
At 15th level, the kineticist can either select a new element or expand her understanding of her original element. She can't select the same element she selected at 7th level. She gains all the benefits from her new expanded element as listed above.
1080431f-2dab-4115-b39e-ad19b185ad47: At 7th level, a magus gains proficiency with medium armor. A magus can cast magus {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} while wearing medium armor without incurring the normal {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Fail_Chance}arcane spell failure chance{/g}. Like any other arcane spellcaster, a magus wearing heavy armor or using a shield incurs a chance of arcane spell failure.
102f4015-4dce-4fa8-9550-37e4e7aae748: At 7th level, a purifier's armor takes on a golden or silvery sheen and becomes light as a feather. Her armor weighs half as much as long as she wears it. She also gains armor training as a fighter 4 levels lower than her oracle level. At 11th level, a purifier gains heavy armor proficiency.
c49b859a-fc0c-40b7-af78-831438bc0467: At 7th level, a reformed fiend gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 3/evil. At 10th level, and every 3 levels thereafter, this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} reduction increases by 3 points. Damage Reduction can reduce damage to 0, but not below 0.
3612ebc4-c6c6-417e-b3c6-34a84d459d0a: At 7th level, a sensei can start a bardic performance as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}.
a540a839-29c4-4a7c-99a2-130b18430cfc: At 7th level, a skald can start a raging song as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} instead of a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}.
cf9c8422-0312-43df-b204-7df8330a5e80: At 7th level, a spawn slayer learns techniques to counteract a foe's {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} advantage. When performing a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} against a studied target of Large or larger size, the spawn slayer gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} equal to the creature's size modifier to {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g} (Large +1, Huge +2, Gargantuan +4, and Colossal +8). The spawn slayer adds this same bonus to his {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when defending against combat maneuvers from a Large or larger studied target.
f63620d5-f053-45ee-acf3-a8d4ab21597c: At 7th level, a sword saint applies his {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier as well as his {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} (minimum 0).
cd531e36-1fa8-4dab-8f31-da1b95f5068f: At 7th level, an Aldori swordlord does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} when standing up from prone.
bda4d596-5ecc-4922-be0f-242df601fa3a: At 7th level, an assassin can apply the poisons as a move or a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
90939a67-55c1-4e1f-8cd4-65c49de55f27: At 7th level, an eldritch font can use her eldritch surge ability to make two {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} associated with a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} and take the better result.
3866f426-664d-43ef-a652-bedb68db287a: At 7th level, and every six levels thereafter, a sorcerer receives one bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The sorcerer must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
de1b9526-dd81-4ddd-8670-172ed265d324:
At 7th level, and every six levels thereafter, a sorcerer receives one bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The sorcerer must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
Bonus Feats of the Abyssal Bloodline: Augment Summoning, Cleave, Empower Spell, Great Fortitude, Power Attack, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Religion}Lore (religion){/g}).
a353fdb5-c8e7-41af-a0a2-ccb5d5ef912d:
At 7th level, and every six levels thereafter, a sorcerer receives one bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The sorcerer must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
Bonus Feats of the Arcane Bloodline: Combat Casting, Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}Initiative{/g}, Iron Will, Reach {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spell{/g}, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_Arcana}Knowledge (arcana){/g}), Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus, Spell Penetration.
0818576d-afe3-4012-a632-980beaaf5ffe:
At 7th level, and every six levels thereafter, a sorcerer receives one bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The sorcerer must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
Bonus Feats of the Celestial Bloodline: Dodge, Extend Spell, Iron Will, Agile Maneuvers, Augment Summoning, Superior Summoning, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Religion}Lore (religion){/g}), Weapon Finesse.
86947044-384c-4af4-ab0f-67471d7bcefb:
At 7th level, and every six levels thereafter, a sorcerer receives one bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The sorcerer must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
Bonus Feats of the Draconic Bloodline: Blind Fight, Great Fortitude, Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}Initiative{/g}, Power Attack, Quicken Spell, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g}), Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_Arcana}Knowledge (arcana){/g}), Toughness.
9ab9a713-9d1f-4b6d-85ae-2b69747b0bf7:
At 7th level, and every six levels thereafter, a sorcerer receives one bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The sorcerer must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
Bonus Feats of the Elemental Bloodline: Dodge, Empower Spell, Great Fortitude, Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}Initiative{/g}, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_Arcana}Knowledge (arcana){/g}), Weapon Finesse.
c981f5eb-0c69-4526-b45e-8135eec2ca83:
At 7th level, and every six levels thereafter, a sorcerer receives one bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The sorcerer must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
Bonus Feats of the Fey Bloodline: Dodge, Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}Initiative{/g}, Lightning Reflexes, Agile Maneuvers, Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, Quicken Spell, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g}).
6e4c9e7a-30a7-4d67-9c32-7ed73268c151:
At 7th level, and every six levels thereafter, a sorcerer receives one bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The sorcerer must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
Bonus Feats of the Infernal Bloodline: Blind Fight, Combat Expertise, Deceitful, Extend Spell, Disarm, Iron Will, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_Arcana}Knowledge (arcana){/g}), {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spell{/g} Penetration.
3670d615-cf60-408e-9557-a86f27dc3d2a:
At 7th level, and every six levels thereafter, a sorcerer receives one bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The sorcerer must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
Bonus Feats of the Serpentine Bloodline: Combat Casting, Combat Reflexes, Deceitful, Deft Hands, Persuasive, Reach {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spell{/g}, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g}), Stealthy.
be923cd9-eefa-411e-85fc-060f8b2713c2:
At 7th level, and every six levels thereafter, a sorcerer receives one bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, chosen from a list specific to each bloodline. The sorcerer must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats.
Bonus Feats of the Undead Bloodline: Combat Casting, Great Fortitude, Iron Will, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Religion}Lore (religion){/g}), Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus, Toughness, Diehard.
56afd469-553a-41c3-b1f3-971a6a96e3ae: At 7th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} a steelblood can sacrifice a bloodrager {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} slot to gain a deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} equal to the level of the spell sacrificed. The deflection bonus lasts until the end of his next turn.
2bcf4307-a02d-4edb-999a-80b603546534:
At 7th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, a student of stone can spend 1 ki point to gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 2/magic until the beginning of his next turn.
At 10th level, he can spend 1 ki point to gain DR 2/chaotic until his next turn.
At 15th level, he can spend 1 ki point to gain DR 5/chaotic until his next turn.
b50253be-ce07-488b-bfa6-ed84fef337fb: At 7th level, her claw {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} (1d4 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
895930c5-839c-407d-b618-ec69a7386538: At 7th level, her spike {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} (1d4 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
377d2602-265f-4ecf-b254-0945ac99647e: At 7th level, his slam {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} (1d4 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
7f6ffbb3-f02b-42a1-8356-42443f1b8612: At 7th level, inspire tranquility also grants a morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} bonus.
f88746b5-76d2-4da4-9e57-b6e98d2b4791: At 7th level, ki strike allows the sohei's {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} and any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with weapons for which he has weapon training to be treated as cold iron and silver for the purpose of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
ba602ce5-31e0-4ba1-a173-4d1e0299a8fa: At 7th level, the demon dancer's dances warp the minds of those who accept them even further, the {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} bonuses of the demon dancer's inspire rage increase by 2, however if affected creature stops attacking or changes the target she suffers ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} + his skald level) points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
0ba88c10-e6cd-4c63-917a-20376acd2793: At 7th level, the monk's {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} are treated as cold iron and silver for the purpose of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
b15a9eb3-e7b5-49b0-a238-f5e5d827a935: At 7th level, the skald becomes a master of many different types of lore, and can choose to take 10 on any Knowledge {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} that he has ranks in.
ada55049-9b75-47b9-87f2-a8afaa05bb75: At 7th level, the student can use Know Your Enemy ability as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} rather than a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}.
2d0bef81-d2c5-44d0-84a3-4f1ebe9f6aba:
At 7th level, the warpriest gains the ability to enhance his armor with divine power as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. This power grants the armor a +1 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. For every 3 levels beyond 7th, this bonus increases by 1 (to a maximum of +5 at 19th level). The warpriest can use this ability a number of minutes per day equal to his warpriest level. This duration must be used in 1-minute increments, but they don't need to be consecutive.
These bonuses stack with any existing bonuses the armor might have, to a maximum of +5. The warpriest can enhance armor any of the following armor special abilities: energy {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} (normal, improved, and greater), fortification (heavy, light, or moderate), glamered, and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} (13, 15, 17, and 19). Adding any of these {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special abilities{/g} replaces an amount of bonus equal to the special ability's base cost. For this purpose, glamered counts as a +1 bonus, energy resistance counts as +2, improved energy resistance counts as +4, and greater energy resistance counts as +5. Duplicate abilities do not stack. The armor must have at least a +1 enhancement bonus before any other special abilities can be added.
8eb6fa3c-2ad8-411d-9fc5-890c9bb9eb9d: At 7th level, when a two-handed fighter makes a full {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}two-handed{/g} weapon, he adds double his {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} for all attacks after the first.
2f81ed9b-f361-42f3-9b0b-556c22cd1e4a:
At 7th level, whenever a divine herbalist heals a living creature with her healer's way ability, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} she can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature) check{/g} to remove certain conditions from the target, with each condition set having an accompanying Lore (nature) {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} (see the list below). Failure by 5 or more causes the target to become sickened for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} (if the divine herbalist is attempting to remove the sickened condition, this extends it by 1 round). Similarly, failure by 10 or more instead causes the target to become nauseated for 1 round or to have its existing nauseated condition extended by 1 round. A creature that cannot be sickened or nauseated cannot have conditions removed by this ability.
Minor Conditions (DC 20): Fatigued, shaken, and sickened.
Major Conditions (DC 25): Dazed and staggered.
Severe Conditions (DC 30): Confused, exhausted, frightened, and nauseated.
Dire Conditions (DC 35): Blinded, paralyzed, and stunned.
This ability replaces the revelation gained at 7th level.
24aa914c-0959-4b31-acc2-72163a83eda2: At 7th level, whenever there are no enemies within 10 feet, you gain 20% {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. At 14th level, you instead gain 50% concealment for one round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your oracle level.
41d1c253-9f67-43ee-ac1e-5f08de0e83a2: At 7th level, whenever there are no enemies within 10 feet, you gain 20% {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. At 14th level, you instead gain 50% concealment for one round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your oracle level.
1bfd4deb-cac3-46e3-afcd-3a842d5d06b6:
At 7th level, while a pack rager is raging, she grants a single teamwork {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} she has to all allies within 50 feet who can see and hear her. She chooses the feat at the start of the rage, and cannot change it during the rage. An ally who moves more than 50 feet away from the raging pack rager loses access to the feat, but regains it again each time he moves back within 50 feet of the raging pack rager. Allies do not need to meet the prerequisites of these teamwork feats.
At 13th level, the pack rager chooses two teamwork feats when she enters a rage, and grants her allies the use of both of those feats when they are within 50 feet of her.
At 19th level, the pack rager chooses three teamwork feats when she enters a rage, and grants her allies the use of all three feats when they are within 50 feet of her.
fe68346b-ca78-4285-8c12-d875b390fb56: At 7th level, while wearing light armor or no armor, a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} dancer gains a +2 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
57269daf-b027-4c3e-a167-550acc7a0ab9: At 7th, 10th, 13th, and 16th levels, a bloodrager learns an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} derived from his bloodline.
28eb5528-d3df-47e7-b609-628eab74b021: At 8th level as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can grant all allies within 30 feet special insights. Once during the next minute, each affected creature can choose to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} twice and take the better result before attempting an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability check{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g}.[LONGSTART] You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and one additional time per day for every 4 levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th.[LONGEND]
3b3755b5-a828-4ea8-a083-545358a38bb5: At 8th level or higher, a monk can slip magically between spaces, as if using the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} dimension door. Using this ability is a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} that consumes 2 points from his ki pool. He cannot take other creatures with him when he uses this ability.
bd478cf0-c26a-44d9-9f6f-ad66422c9a22:
At 8th level, a colluding scoundrel deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} additional points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} against a target {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatened{/g} by an ally currently designated as the scapegoat. This increases to 3d6 points of damage at 15th level.
This is precision damage and is not multiplied on a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, but it does stack with sneak attack and similar effects.
9e2e6f70-c5a1-432f-b7d9-033e2ea23bfb: At 8th level, a fire dancer adds burning hands, burning arc, and fireball to his list of bard {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} known (as 1st-, 2nd-, and 3rd-level spells, respectively).
d35350e5-003f-4d17-923a-12e6cfbfeee7:
At 8th level, a herald caller receives Superior Summoning as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
Superior Summoning: You can summon more creatures. Each time you cast a summoning {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that conjures more than one creature, add one to the total number of creatures summoned.
c16db816-c1b2-4e53-a27d-722739d1c30d: At 8th level, a paladin is immune to blindness (magical or otherwise). Each ally within 10 feet of her gains a +4 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against blindness effects.
48bfce1b-87a7-449f-951a-b59e323e619e:
At 8th level, a paladin is immune to charm {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g}. Each ally within 10 feet of her gains a +4 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against charm effects.
This ability functions only while the paladin is conscious, not if she is {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g} or dead.
bb7f24cc-6de3-4195-95ad-26d1ca9ae958: At 8th level, a preservationist adds summon nature's ally IV to his formula book as a 3rd-level extract.
b7e3015d-8748-43e8-89ac-bffb7e7ec3dd: At 8th level, a swordlord can throw up a blazing wall of steel to defend himself. When fighting defensively with a dueling sword, the swordlord's {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} are reduced by 2, and the dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} is increased by 2 for the same round.
b63f725a-92cb-4dc3-94c4-340cd8a32125: At 8th level, a sylvan trickster gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 2/cold iron. At 11th level and every 3 levels thereafter, this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} reduction increases by 2 (to a maximum of DR 10/cold iron at 20th level).
096f5c02-5cdf-4868-bad3-cf07e68a488f: At 8th level, a winter witch's {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} become horrendously cold. Half the cold {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} caused by these effects comes from an otherworldly power and is not subject to being reduced by resistance or immunity to cold-based {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
4db45cee-82d8-4e1b-be74-3b75807e76c2: At 8th level, an assassin can use the {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} even while being observed. An assassin can hide himself from view in the open without having anything to actually hide behind.
36b6bdb0-7893-4494-b106-2a004f0dfe64: At 8th level, an order of the lion cavalier can call out to his allies, inspiring them to greatness. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, the cavalier can grant a competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} to all allies within 30 feet. This bonus lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. This ability can be used once per combat.
75553a74-227e-4d54-8d00-a9d68569ad03: At 8th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} you can shoot a blast of divine moonlight from your eyes, as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} against a single target within 30 feet. Moonfire deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per 2 levels in the class that gave you access to this domain, and the target is dazzled for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Moonfire deals 1d10 points of damage per level in the class that gave you access to this domain against lycanthropes.[LONGSTART] You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and one additional time per day for every 4 levels beyond 8th.[LONGEND]
02443b1b-6dda-4da0-beef-75306da5af61: At 8th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, you can call down a bolt of lightning. You can call down a bolt of lightning a number of times per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. This ability otherwise functions as call lightning.
0d9f4fa7-7f0e-48d7-b657-201dc5803e78: At 8th level, once per bloodrage you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}reroll{/g} the first failed {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} you just made.
23e43512-daf7-4920-a221-2d98ca8544ff:
At 8th level, once per day you can create a wall of energy. You can choose fire, cold, acid, or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}.
An immobile, blazing curtain of the chosen energy springs into existence. The wall deals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of the chosen energy type when it appears, and to all creatures in the area on your turn each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. The wall also deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of damage of the chosen energy type + 1 point of that type per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +20) to any creature passing through it. The wall deals double damage to undead creatures.
At 12th level and every 4 levels thereafter, you can use this ability one additional time per day, to a maximum of 4 times at level 20.
86a3cf24-436d-4c58-8287-b83847b2c26b: At 8th level, the cavalier can call upon his faith to bolster himself in combat. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}, the cavalier can call out the name of his deity, granting him a morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} equal to his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. In addition, any allies within 30 feet that share his faith also receive half this bonus (minimum +1). The cavalier can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 12th level and every four levels thereafter.
8589ff36-94ea-499f-bad7-b6920974b580: At 8th level, the cavalier can steal the glory from another creature's successful strike. Whenever a creature other than the cavalier scores a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} against a target that the cavalier is threatening, he can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against the same target.
bc7dd707-98bf-4b94-bc43-53a9e251e82e: At 8th level, the cavalier's weapons are treated as having the cavalier's {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g} for the purpose of overcoming the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} of undead creatures. Against an undead target of his challenge, the cavalier automatically overcomes all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} reduction that undead possesses.
88182c5c-eb07-4174-b381-447aa0462864: At 8th level, the drovier can choose to grant her allies the benefits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} aspect of the falcon instead of an animal aspect.
8f35a234-952f-410d-98ba-a6946cfa7699: At 8th level, the magus's ability to cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and make {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} improves. When using the spell combat ability, the magus receives a +2 circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g}.
1b509f1f-03a9-41d8-b5f9-3b6e66011d38: At 8th level, the nimbus of light heals the paladin and her allies, {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}curing{/g} of them of {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}, as per the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} lesser restoration. A creature can only be healed in this way once per day.
6c0a1363-eb08-4d7a-b541-3bdd5023c803:
At 8th level, the thundercaller can use her performance to summon bolts of lightning that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}. The lightning storm lasts for as long as she continues her performance, calling down one bolt of lightning per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} on a random enemy within 50 feet of the thundercaller.
If in a stormy area (including a whirlwind formed by an air elemental of at least Large {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g}), each bolt deals 3d10 points of electricity {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} instead of 3d6.
171039ea-0913-4d2f-8753-d7cd47e9b79a: At 8th level, the witch doctor can choose to lose any prepared magic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that is 3rd level or higher in order to spontaneously cast dispel magic or remove curse. This ability can only target a spell effect that is on an ally (including herself ). If she forfeits a magic spell higher than 3rd level, she gains a +2 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on her {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to dispel the spell or to remove the curse for every spell level higher than 3rd that she sacrifices.
760fb9e5-1f2d-4c95-a019-7e695fd24e9a: At 8th level, three times per day you can try to daze an opponent in close range with a hypnotic glare as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. The target gets a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to resist the effect ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + half bloodrager level + {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier). This is a mind-affecting gaze effect.
4b2e2791-9215-4621-9b78-2e4747b95234: At 8th level, when entering a bloodrage, you can choose to apply the effects of either displacement or haste to yourself. This is in addition to arcane bloodrage, and otherwise works as that ability.
7d7c0533-126b-4da9-9d5b-8852221b3d6e: At 8th level, when entering a rage, a beastkin berserker can take the form of a Medium leopard. This functions as beast shape II, except the duration is for as long as the beastkin berserker rages.
9432a22b-49c1-47fc-9055-c5a51d35c9dd: At 8th level, when the cavalier uses his wolf or dog mount to perform a bull rush or overrun {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}maneuver{/g}, the mount gains a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on the combat maneuver. He also receives a bonus mounted combat {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}
d7b6a747-102f-4fb1-b8cc-3cf810a370ad: At 8th level, whenever a hunter uses her animal focus ability, she selects two different animal aspects for herself instead of one, and can assign two aspects to her companion instead of one.
0f880ccd-67d2-43eb-9bb7-cfa308340e3c: At 8th level, whenever an inquisitor uses her judgment ability, she selects two different judgments, instead of one. This only consumes one use of her judgment ability. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, she can change one of these judgments to another type.
eea24898-732d-490c-ab8e-676ec2663746: At 8th level, whenever the cavalier makes a charge {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} while mounted, he adds his mount's {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier to the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage roll{/g}, in addition to his own. He also receives a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, chosen from the following list: Indomitable Mount, Mounted Combat, Mounted Shield, Spirited Charge, or Trample. He must qualify for the feat selected.
b29fd9e7-7f45-4aa8-82d3-b62fb86bd5c2: At 8th level, you add 1/2 of your level in the class that gave you access to this domain as an enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics checks{/g}.
d4264596-d394-4c0c-8b39-3db98d2b8b68: At 8th level, you become a blur of motion when you move. As long as you move at least 10 feet, you gain the effects of the blur {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
8b308ffe-cf30-48e0-b6e9-afa412cee037: At 8th level, you can cast charm person as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, with a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of 10 + 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier. Effect of charm person lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
880be082-ce23-44e5-803e-dd4c38fb28c7: At 8th level, you can change your shape for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your wizard level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive. This ability otherwise functions like beast shape II or elemental body I. At 12th level, this ability functions like beast shape III or elemental body II.
680bd58c-48da-4edc-8542-b1206fd321d0: At 8th level, you can create a ward that protects a specified area. Creating this ward is a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}. All friendly creatures in the area receive a resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} and an equal competence bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} while inside the warded area. The ward lasts for 1 hour per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day.
28bc10f3-1a38-4f23-8fd6-b63785cd041b: At 8th level, you can create a ward that protects a specified area. Creating this ward is a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}. All friendly creatures in the area receive a resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} and an equal competence bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} while inside the warded area. This ward immediately ends if you leave the area. The ward lasts for 1 hour per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day.
92bf69ab-093f-4f47-9319-a39fff43bfc4: At 8th level, you can create a warding rune in a desired location. Any creature entering a 5-foot area around the rune must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} or they will not be able to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. The rune lasts a number of rounds equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain.[LONGSTART] You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every four levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th.[LONGEND]
5ad13435-8e4a-47a8-bbbd-7d90d074121f: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of despair for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your wizard level. Enemies within this aura take a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. These rounds do not need to be consecutive. This is a mind-affecting effect.
134945c1-f04a-48a3-a73c-02447f43ad65: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of destruction for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. All {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made against targets in this aura (including you) gain a morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain and all {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} threats are automatically confirmed. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
1626bd21-500d-4642-b705-37cb2e81b403: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of freedom for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Allies within this aura are not affected by difficult terrain or the confused, frightened, panicked, paralyzed, slowed, shaken, or staggered conditions. This aura only suppresses these effects, and they return once a creature leaves the aura or when the aura ends, if applicable. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
69691e87-c88a-4d3e-bfca-92286c80a158: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of heroism for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Using this ability is a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. Allies in the area are treated as if they were under the effects of heroism {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
110fd0bf-efab-476a-83ed-8b64f9af23d0: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of madness for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Enemies within this aura are affected by confusion unless they succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} equal to 10 + 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier. The confusion effect ends immediately when the creature leaves the area or the aura expires. Creatures that succeed on their saving throw are immune to this aura for 24 hours.
11a868dd-78a7-4b40-b9c0-185c0409bfbb: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of protection for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You and your allies within this aura gain a +1 deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and resistance 5 against all elements (acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic). The deflection bonus increases by +1 for every four levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th. At 14th level, the resistance against all elements increases to 10. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
5c752b03-f3d6-4e9b-b745-29c340aecb45: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura that wards against {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Living creatures in this area are immune to all death effects, energy drain, and effects that cause negative levels. This ward does not remove negative levels that a creature has already gained, but the negative levels have no effect while the creature is inside the warded area. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
18212c2d-8038-4ebe-84b1-9ac044159760: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot nimbus of light for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Any hostile creature within this radius must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} to resist the effects of this aura. If the creature fails, it is blinded until it leaves the area of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. A creature that has resisted the effect cannot be affected again by this particular aura. In addition, undead within this radius take an amount of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain each round that they remain inside the nimbus. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
4e59b26f-ccbd-4504-9459-57fcc1648d71:
At 8th level, you can extend or alter the range of your next {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} as though using the Extend Spell or Reach Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} accordingly. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every two wizard levels you possess beyond 8th.
Extend Spell: An extended spell lasts twice as long as normal. A spell with a duration of {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration{/g}, instantaneous, or permanent is not affected by this feat.
Reach Spell: You can alter a spell with a range of touch, close, or medium to increase its range by one range category, using the following order: touch, close, medium, and long. Spells modified by this feat that require melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attacks{/g} instead require ranged touch {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
464655db-c501-4032-89e1-5d3a79869e33: At 8th level, you can give a weapon touched the anarchic special weapon quality for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.
d0df8d88-8e07-4471-be30-7c3ec018cc11: At 8th level, you can give a weapon touched the unholy special weapon quality for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain.[LONGSTART] You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.[LONGEND]
e7350137-55bd-4e58-b087-aebd98bfa459: At 8th level, you can give a weapon you touch the anarchic special weapon quality for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.
455c14d8-6a33-42ac-9341-7b3ad02751e8: At 8th level, you can give a weapon you touch the axiomatic special weapon quality for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain.[LONGSTART] You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.[LONGEND]
eceb42d9-211b-46ce-aee5-b3c6aca57c0c: At 8th level, you can give a weapon you touch the holy special weapon quality for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain.
b0ef0e8c-b490-4587-b0c2-230b29979b6a: At 8th level, you can issue an inspiring command to your allies, who must all be within 30 feet of you. Affected allies gain a +2 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}Combat Maneuver Defense{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1). You can use this power a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
1bae9aad-2ba5-4436-b1ad-630ca212a32d: At 8th level, you can make yourself and any number of allies within 30 feet invisible for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. The rounds do not need to be consecutive.
f2282210-2a73-41bf-8798-2202148ae772: At 8th level, you can make yourself invisible as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your wizard level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive. This otherwise functions as greater invisibility.
900afb53-f07f-4bd9-926d-269c1e397c20: At 8th level, you can teleport up to 10 feet per level in the class that gave you access to this domain per day as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. This teleportation must be used in 5-foot increments and such movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
3401c36d-2f68-4775-b1b7-953a931f6d93: At 8th level, you can use a targeted dispel magic effect as a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every four levels in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th.
bb7bf9eb-540f-4789-aaeb-40fb74e40e77: At 8th level, you can use this ability to teleport up to 30 feet as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. You can use this ability a total number of times per day equal to your wizard level.
8fb2aa0b-ba23-4b7c-b498-51ca25d89527: At 8th level, you can use your domain's greater power.
67ebfac6-0308-4c35-a3c9-78ca791ac38a: At 8th level, you can utter a prediction of the immediate future. While your foretelling is in effect, you emit a 30-foot aura of fortune that aids your allies or hinders your enemies, as chosen by you at the time of prediction. If you choose to aid, you and your allies gain a +2 luck {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. If you choose to hinder, your enemies take a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on those {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} instead. You can use this ability for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your wizard level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
346b0218-be7b-4bde-be89-f1607aba8982: At 8th level, you can utter a prediction of the immediate future. While your foretelling is in effect, you emit a 30-foot aura of fortune that aids your allies. You and your allies gain a +2 luck {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. You can use this ability for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your wizard level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
8ac3a43c-5d19-4861-8c12-640284d62458: At 8th level, you can utter a prediction of the immediate future. While your foretelling is in effect, you emit a 30-foot aura of fortune that hinders your enemies. Your enemies take a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. You can use this ability for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your wizard level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
8524155d-522c-40e9-8fff-8af5e70b4d1d: At 8th level, you gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against enchantment and fear effects.
de99d9bd-9255-4d24-acf7-b77887c9c9d8: At 8th level, you gain a breath weapon that you can use once per day. This breath weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of your energy type per bloodrager level. Those caught in the area of the breath can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} for half damage. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this save is equal to 10 + half your bloodrager level + your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier. The shape of the breath weapon depends on your dragon type. At 16th level, you can use this ability twice per day. At 20th level, you can use this ability three times per day.
b97adcad-b3f5-403d-903b-50968d4da9e5: At 8th level, you gain blindsight to a range of 10 feet for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your wizard level. This ability only allows you to detect living creatures and undead creatures. This sight also tells you whether a creature is living or undead. Constructs and other creatures that are neither living nor undead cannot be seen with this ability. The range of this ability increases by 10 feet at 12th level, and by an additional 10 feet for every four levels beyond 12th. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
5a18271c-e256-4e66-aa17-77e7ed84f855: At 8th level, you gain cold {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} and negative energy resistance 10.
1db84077-c28c-43bc-a6da-cea1f6d592ff: At 8th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} 5 to acid, cold, and fire. At 16th level, these resistances increase to 10.
720b975f-a041-4931-bd2d-c1da9af713a7:
At 8th level, you {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} instead of taking damage from channeled negative energy. If the channeled negative energy targets undead, you heal {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} just like undead in the area.
If you are undead, then you instead do not take {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}damage from positive energy{/g}.
626656ea-ee56-4d6a-a8da-40585020d28e: At 8th level, your Aura of Efficiency grants your allies {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 1/—. This DR increases by +1/— for every three levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th.
3f058a64-ca27-4963-92e3-4c3f8e205112: At 8th level, your base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} increases by 10 feet, and you gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities with your elemental descriptor.
9c9c601c-9868-4592-b916-d69e057535eb: At 8th, 16th, 17th, and 20th levels, a sanctified slayer can gain a single slayer talent, including those from the list of rogue talents that a slayer can take, but not an advanced slayer talent.
ead0386f-56e9-4362-9cd4-60deb633575e: At 9th level the wandering marksman can swap his animal companion and himself for a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}Attack of Opportunity{/g} if they are within a 30-foot range to each other.
a81750d7-3159-493c-96ab-279c52e39d38: At 9th level, a Hellknight signifer gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/chaotic and becomes immune to poison.
ff798279-a4a7-4eea-ba49-68918185bd9d: At 9th level, a blight druid gains immunity to all diseases, including natural and supernatural diseases. She also becomes immune to effects that would cause her to become sickened or nauseated.
0a403a22-2283-4603-83fd-f0391eb1fae5: At 9th level, a blood kineticist can infuse her blasts with the ability to manipulate her opponent's insides to the point of impairing their function. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g}, the target is sickened for 1 minute. This is a 4th-level substance infusion that costs 3 points of burn and can be used with water and blood blasts.
b1fb3ce3-40f8-483f-b67a-680161177827: At 9th level, a daredevil can't be {g|Encyclopedia:Flanking}flanked{/g}.
d32ee06a-3160-4754-a17a-251668baec6b: At 9th level, a defender of the true world becomes immune to the mind-affecting effects of fey.
f01380f4-4ea1-42b0-ba92-a68599bb2d9a:
At 9th level, a dragonblood shifter can push her form closer to that of a true dragon. She gains a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against sleep and paralysis effects. She does not gain the wild shape ability until 9th level. When using the ability, she takes on the form of a true dragon; this ability functions as the dragonkind I {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} instead of beast shape II.
You become a {g|Encyclopedia:Size}medium{/g} dragon-like creature. You gain a +4 polymorph bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, a +2 polymorph bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +4 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, and resistance to one element. Your movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g}), two claws (1d6), and two secondary wing {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} (1d4) (secondary attacks do not benefit from shifter claws). Your breath weapon and resistance depend on the type of your dragon prototype. You can only use the breath weapon once per 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. All breath weapons deal 6d8 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
This ability lasts for 1 minute (the Master Shapeshifter mythic ability makes this duration permanent). Using dragon shape is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} that does not cause {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The dragonblood shifter can use dragon shape a number of times per day equal to her shifter level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
This alters wild shape and replaces chimeric aspect.
de8039ab-c330-4edd-bf0f-62b6571e3668: At 9th level, a druid gains immunity to all poisons.
17890d16-1f3c-467c-b210-77e96beca6f5: At 9th level, a duelist gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} and can make one additional attack of opportunity.
f1fb4e43-2ff9-4069-90e9-2356b1afd746: At 9th level, a duelist gains the benefit of the Deflect Arrows {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} when using a light or {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} weapon. The duelist does not need a free hand to use this feat.
81a80d7a-901e-41b6-888b-5d0d6504afe2:
At 9th level, a feyform shifter gains a second shifter aspect, chosen from the animal aspects normally available to shifters. When she uses her shifter aspect ability to take on her fey aspect, she can choose a second aspect and assume the minor form of that aspect, alongside her fey aspect, allowing her to combine her fey aspect with the animal aspects available to her.
This modifies chimeric aspect.
fc2c81ab-6ac2-4565-be0e-ecc72cc69016:
At 9th level, a flamewarden can fan the last spark of a recently slain creature's life force back into a full flame. Once per day as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, a flamewarden can touch the corpse of a creature to grant it the effects of breath of life.
Breath of Life: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cures{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +25).
Unlike other spells that heal damage, breath of life can bring recently slain creatures back to life. If cast upon a creature that has died within 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, apply the healing from this spell to the creature. If the healed creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit point{/g} total is at a negative amount less than its {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score, it comes back to life and stabilizes at its new hit point total. If the creature's hit point total is at a negative amount equal to or greater than its Constitution score, the creature remains dead. Creatures brought back to life through breath of life gain a temporary negative level that lasts for 1 day.
Creatures slain by death effects cannot be saved by breath of life.
Like cure spells, breath of life deals damage to undead creatures rather than curing them, and cannot bring them back to life.
c7dd4af4-3ba6-497b-9bf3-36bab9e353ba: At 9th level, a quarterstaff master can use his quarterstaff to make his first {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} during a flurry of blows make a free sunder attempt, which does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}.
8b16061e-fa9e-4818-984f-830640645a04: At 9th level, a skald gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
