7e2a9dda-8dd8-49ac-8fbc-25499ee34083: The arcanist can unleash a freezing projectile by expending 1 point from her arcane reservoir and making a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} against any one target within 30 feet. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} hits, it deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} + the arcanist's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier, plus an additional 1d6 points of cold {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} for every 2 levels beyond 1st (to a maximum of 10d6 at 19th level). In addition, the target is staggered for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. It can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} to negate the staggered condition.
8d470402-74ca-4c84-98ce-899f9b7d363e: The arcanist can unleash a jet of acid by expending 1 point from her arcane reservoir and making a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} against any one target in close range. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} hits, it deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} + the arcanist's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier, plus an additional 1d6 points of acid {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} for every 2 levels beyond 1st (to a maximum of 10d6 at 19th level). The target is also sickened for 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. It can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} to negate the sickened condition.
00bfb89c-dfb8-4453-b2f2-fca19e2eba5c: The arcanist can unleash a jet of holy water by expending 1 point from her arcane reservoir. This creates a 30-foot line of water that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of damage plus the arcanist's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier, plus an additional 1d8 points of damage for every 2 levels beyond 1st (to a maximum of 10d8 at 19th level) to each target in the line that would normally take damage from holy water. Creatures in the area of effect can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} to halve the damage.
3945a449-33e3-4876-9f9c-db401e8e123e: The arcanist can unleash a lance of lightning by expending 1 point from her arcane reservoir and making a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} against any one target within 30 feet. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} hits, it deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} + the arcanist's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier) points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}, plus 1d6 points of electricity {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} for every 2 levels beyond 1st (to a maximum of 10d6 at 19th level). The target's vision is also impaired, causing the target to treat all creatures as if they had {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} (20%) for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. It can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} to negate the impaired vision.
b5750f8f-dae8-4066-992c-e8262e155266: The arcanist can unleash an arc of flame by expending 1 point from her arcane reservoir. This creates a 30-foot line of flame that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} + the arcanist's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier, plus an additional 1d6 points of fire {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} for every 2 levels beyond 1st (to a maximum of 10d6 at 19th level) to each target in the line. Creatures in the area of effect may attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} to halve the damage.
4a745c54-23ed-4f4e-98a5-5c06927aefc4: The arcanist can use the consume {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} class feature or the consume magic items exploit as {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift actions{/g} instead of as {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move actions{/g}.
aff3fba6-1488-45b1-bbe7-7b2eb192b1fe: The arcanist gains a +2 natural armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/{g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing{/g}, where N is equal to her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier (minimum 1). While this ability is in effect, she counts as both her original creature type and a plant creature for the purpose of abilities and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
a5e9c8fb-d930-4f61-9ad6-9af051356f59: The arcanist infuses herself with the toughness of the plant life that she studies. The arcanist can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir to gain a +2 natural armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/{g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing{/g} where N is equal to her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier (minimum 1), for 1 minute per arcanist level. While this ability is in effect, she counts as both her original creature type and a plant creature for the purpose of abilities and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
db02b419-0c08-499b-8ef6-ce858a9dcb55:
The aspect of the bear invokes a juggernaut of tireless endurance and furious power. Those who take this aspect are known for surviving severe wounds and delivering punishing blows in return.
Minor Form: You gain a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score. At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, it increases to +6.
Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a large dire bear. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +10 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and two claw attacks (1d6 damage) with the grabber ability. At 8th level, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with your claw attacks. At 15th level, your {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} multiplier with your claw attacks increases by 1 (×2 becomes ×3, for example) up to a maximum of ×4, and you gain the Awesome Blow {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite, claw
274bc870-995c-4653-beaf-0f6691db4d5c:
The aspect of the bear invokes a juggernaut of tireless endurance and furious power. Those who take this aspect are known for surviving severe wounds and delivering punishing blows in return. The shifter can shift into her aspect's minor form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. Shifting into a minor form is a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, while ending the effect is a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
Minor Form: You gain a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score. At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, it increases to +6.
ea7c37e9-99c6-44c8-bee1-1f2ad5f6f7ed:
The aspect of the horse grants speed and maneuverability.
Minor Form: You gain the Endurance {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} as well as an inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of +5 feet to your base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}. At 8th level, the bonus to your base speed increases to +10 feet. At 15th level, the bonus to your base speed increases to +15 feet.
Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a large horse. While in this form, you gain a speed bonus of +20 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), two hoof {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and your attacks deal double damage if used when charging or attempting an overrun {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}maneuver{/g}. At 8th level, you can move through {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatened squares{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}, and you gain the overrun ability. At 15th level, you gain Improved Overrun as a bonus feat. You do not need to meet the prerequisites for this feat.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: hoof
8323bd64-b2a4-4b0c-8709-570de2bf4b36:
The aspect of the horse grants speed and maneuverability. The shifter can shift into her aspect's minor form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. Shifting into a minor form is a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, while ending the effect is a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
Minor Form: You gain the Endurance {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} as well as an inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of +5 feet to your base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}. At 8th level, the bonus to your base speed increases to +10 feet. At 15th level, the bonus to your base speed increases to +15 feet.
3b879e4c-3651-4905-9034-906699383834:
The aspect of the lizard is one of swift, graceful movement, granting the ability to dart and scurry with an astounding agility and balance.
Minor Form: You gain a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on Reflex {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, it increases to +6.
Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a large lizard. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +10 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), and a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}) with the grabber ability. At 8th level, your speed bonus increases to +30 feet. At 15th level, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with your bite attack.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite
b60636ca-a654-4082-86ad-1c3bd1e2c347:
The aspect of the lizard is one of swift, graceful movement, granting the ability to dart and scurry with an astounding agility and balance. The shifter can shift into her aspect's minor form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. Shifting into a minor form is a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, while ending the effect is a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
Minor Form: You gain a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on Reflex {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, it increases to +6.
e1d52749-ec57-4a17-a89f-57212705596b:
The aspect of the stalwart mammoth grants hardiness and the power to trample one's foes into dust.
Minor Form: You gain a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} score. At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, it increases to +6.
Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a large mammoth. While in this form, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a gore {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and two slam attacks (1d8 damage). You also gain a +2 racial bonus to your Strength {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} and a +2 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. At 8th level, you gain the overrun ability. At 15th level, you gain Bull Rush as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, and your racial bonus to Strength ability score and natural armor bonus to AC increase to +4.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: gore, slam
0a460a53-b33c-4204-8b62-08ad2b128fc0:
The aspect of the stalwart mammoth grants hardiness and the power to trample one's foes into dust. The shifter can shift into her aspect's minor form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. Shifting into a minor form is a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, while ending the effect is a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
Minor Form: You gain a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} score. At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, it increases to +6.
5b0e7a92-2570-48bb-8f83-394ab51c86bf:
The aspect of the wolf provides the senses and the attacks of the mighty wolf, whose instincts are honed to track and take down its prey.
Minor Form: You gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability with a range of 10 feet and a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}. At 8th level, the range of your scent ability increases to 20 feet and the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, the range of your scent ability increases to 30 feet and the bonus increases to +6.
Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a large dire wolf. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +20 feet, the scent ability (30 feet), a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} damage), and you can attempt to trip your opponent as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} if you hit them with a bite attack. At 8th level, the range of your scent ability increases to 40 feet, and you gain a +4 racial bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (Nature) checks{/g}. At 15th level, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with your bite attack.
Primary natural attacks: bite
d2ea9612-e61b-4526-85e0-492f5058b47f:
The aspect of the wolf provides the senses and the attacks of the mighty wolf, whose instincts are honed to track and take down its prey. The shifter can shift into her aspect's minor form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. Shifting into a minor form is a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, while ending the effect is a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
Minor Form: You gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability with a range of 10 feet and a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}. At 8th level, the range of your scent ability increases to 20 feet and the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, the range of your scent ability increases to 30 feet and the bonus increases to +6.
a0a29474-356e-4330-8e2c-889c49cb2a56: The barbarian can continually replenish her {g|Encyclopedia:HP}health{/g}. At the start of her turn, she regains 1 temporary hit point for every 4 levels she has (up to 5 hit points per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}), but this cannot give her more than her maximum temporary hit points from rage. This is a stance rage power. A barbarian must have the renewed vigor rage power and be at least 4th level to select this rage power.
89d5baf1-2268-4798-b16a-82c1638c4534:
The barbarian can focus her ferocity. She gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} and thrown weapon damage rolls. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 levels the barbarian has.
This is a stance rage power. A barbarian can't have more than one stance rage power active at a time. If she activates a stance rage power while another one is active, the current stance immediately ends.
bc006973-1ef8-40b1-bd6b-f8f2646589a7:
The barbarian can focus her strikes. She gains a +1 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} rolls and thrown weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 levels the barbarian has.
This is a stance rage power. A barbarian can't have more than one stance rage power active at a time. If she activates a stance rage power while another one is active, the current stance immediately ends.
e25c368c-1372-4fbd-bc59-18beeabc4dec:
The barbarian can take on a more defensive posture. This grants her a +1 dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to her {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} for the duration of her current rage. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 levels the barbarian has.
This is a stance rage power. A barbarian can't have more than one stance rage power active at a time. If she activates a stance rage power while another one is active, the current stance immediately ends.
cfbd1d89-db28-469c-969b-dc5af4550b54:
The barbarian can {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} with abandon at the expense of her defense. She gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on attack rolls, but takes a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. This bonus and penalty increase by 1 at 4th level and every 4 levels thereafter.
This is a stance rage power. A barbarian can't have more than one stance rage power active at a time. If she activates a stance rage power while another one is active, the current stance immediately ends.
31d19169-08db-41c6-b442-b884acc1984f: The barbarian gains a 10-foot enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to her base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}. A barbarian can select this rage power up to three times; its effects stack.
947fb65a-2126-4813-ae5a-e6eb18d58a0e: The barbarian gains the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability while raging and can use this ability to locate unseen foes. The barbarian can detect opponents within 30 feet by sense of smell as if she had {g|Encyclopedia:Blindsense}blindsense{/g}.
8d80118c-bcb9-46b6-bd15-c1699296e549: The barbarian is immune to the shaken and frightened conditions. A barbarian must be at least 12th level to select this rage power.
1c7f5127-dad9-4d3c-ab00-3591cd7525c4: The barbarian is immune to the sickened and nauseated conditions. A barbarian must be at least 8th level to select this rage power.
888053ce-c565-42a4-8045-b0031ca2170c: The barbarian unlocks a new ability to use while raging. She gains one additional rage power. She must meet all of the prerequisites for this rage power. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can be taken multiple times.
a3ba8e9e-2ddd-4405-8558-7ecf1475497d: The barbarian's dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} from Guarded Stance is doubled against {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} while Guarded Stance is active. A barbarian must have the Guarded Stance rage power and be at least 6th level to select this rage power.
e46db326-68f6-4dbc-88de-42778ff1de32: The barbarian's {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} increases by 2/—. A barbarian can select this rage power up to three times. Its effects stack. A barbarian must be at least 8th level to select this rage power.
8eb2f37f-cc44-4e4f-9567-05d0e06cf2f7: The bard gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
fa2d1df2-dbd9-4105-9c7f-61fb8d903754: The battle scion possesses a unique mixture of courtly grace alongside martial and magical prowess. She is a warrior-poet, as skilled with her words as she is with blades. Battle scions sometimes rule as queens over courts of brave knights who scour the world championing bold quests.
a38de7db-5a34-4e02-91fe-4d2657830e08: The best friends of some shamans are shadows, which they use to conceal their actions and find the best opportunities to attack their foes.
4845b599-5480-44b8-8c2c-84c11c09b44a:
The bloodrager's source of internal power grants him the ability to bloodrage.
At 1st level, a bloodrager can bloodrage for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to 4 + his {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier. At each level after 1st, he can bloodrage for 2 additional rounds per day. Temporary increases to Constitution (such as those gained from bloodraging or {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} like bear's endurance) don't increase the total number of rounds that a bloodrager can bloodrage per day. The total number of rounds of bloodrage per day is renewed after resting for 8 hours, although these hours need not be consecutive.
While in a bloodrage, a bloodrager gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} rolls, melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, thrown weapon damage rolls, and Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. In addition, he takes a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}. He also gains 2 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Die{/g}. These temporary hit points are lost first when a character takes damage, disappear when the bloodrage ends, and are not replenished if the bloodrager enters a bloodrage again within 1 minute of his previous bloodrage.
If a bloodrager falls {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g}, his bloodrage immediately ends, placing him in peril of death.
Bloodrage counts as the barbarian's rage class feature for the purpose of {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} prerequisites, feat abilities, magic item abilities, and spell effects.
e8acbf46-ebc4-4903-9341-94fd0ef6ccc2: The bloodrider is adept at pushing his mount to its limit. The {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} of any mount the bloodrager rides increases by 10 feet.
55eac0c1-1c73-43d6-8beb-2eea38ce6c18: The bulwark gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} 2/-. At 4th level and every 4 levels thereafter, it increases by 1.
8377e761-e683-4002-9304-2a1c2d1595bd:
The capricious nature of the fey runs in your family due to some intermingling of fey blood or magic. You are more emotional than most, prone to bouts of joy and rage. You have always had a tie to the natural world, and as your power increases, so does the influence of the fey over your magic.
Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}Feats{/g} of the Fey Bloodline: Dodge, Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}Initiative{/g}, Lightning Reflexes, Agile Maneuvers, Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, Quicken Spell, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g}).
9f2f52d4-d261-474e-abb5-1e8e737eee03:
The carrion-stenched Kabriri, Him Who Gnaws, is the demon lord of ghouls, graves, and secrets kept by the dead. According to legend, Kabriri is the reborn form of the first humanoid to devour his kin in life. Kabriri is predominantly worshiped by the cannibalistic ghouls that dwell in the hidden warrens beneath Golarion's surface. His followers enact bloody rituals in his honor beneath the gibbous moon, dancing and feasting beneath the night sky.
Domains: Death, Chaos, Evil, Knowledge, Undead.
Favored Weapon: Flail
09f53417-5c3a-426a-bc98-2c88e6b3ac9e: The cavalier is defined not only by his dedication to his order or his skill on the battlefield, but also by the special relationship he maintains with his mount. Where some cavaliers are simply skilled with horses or well-trained knights, the beast rider spends his life in constant pursuit of the most perfect mount, forming bonds with greater, more powerful, and more exotic creatures.
e613c1ca-3c2e-486e-8e02-31bc992fa358: The cavaliers known as Knights of the Wall revere a famous general who was crucial in the defeat of a powerful wizard-king.
c9552d7b-a9c9-410c-9300-763071ca88ac: The character can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against an opponent who has just been struck for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} in melee by another character. This {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} counts as an attack of opportunity for that {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} and can't be used more than once per round.
19d9d2ad-bf2d-40c4-ba77-34accc34ab23:
The character can no longer be {g|Encyclopedia:Flanking}flanked{/g}.
This defense denies another rogue the ability to sneak attack the character by flanking her, unless the attacker has at least four more rogue levels than the target does.
375e282f-e4fe-433f-be59-ae5983c0e65e:
The character can react to danger before her senses would normally allow her to do so. She cannot be caught {g|Encyclopedia:Flat_Footed}flat-footed{/g}, nor does she lose her {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} if the attacker is invisible. She still loses her Dexterity bonus to AC if immobilized. A character with this ability can still lose her Dexterity bonus to AC if an opponent successfully uses the feint action against her.
If a character already has uncanny dodge from a different class, she automatically gains improved uncanny dodge instead.
e78ae7aa-a0cd-4d42-be4d-c67adfd20de4: The character chooses a companion from the list of available animals. Animal companion can wear barding and gains new abilities as they advance.
4250b9ef-1424-4d7d-b88c-5ed746573bc6: The character gains a lot of bonus teamwork {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} that empower both them and their allies who possess the same feat, while fighting together. Hunter can also apply these feats' effects to their animal companion.
fafb9502-35c2-48f5-9646-3086ed292130: The character gains bonus command {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} that empower allies who fight side by side if they have the same feats, and gives their effects to all teammates.
5506ec6e-bb06-4d9c-817a-d77d42e7c30d: The character gains bonus teamwork {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} that empower the allies who both have them while fighting side by side. The inquisitor gains the benefits of these feats even if their allies do not have them.
01d4f6ed-f96d-49cb-9180-af613f474c96: The character takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}.
6d0b868b-5288-4e38-ac98-543efdaa7be7: The colluding scoundrel is a canny and conniving skirmisher, manipulating her enemies and leveraging her allies for her own benefit.
012ac9f8-3389-47d7-9ecc-6b0b092ff0f2:
The conjurer focuses on the study of summoning monsters and magic alike to bend to his will.
Summoner's Charm: Whenever you cast a conjuration (summoning) {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, increase the duration by a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your wizard level (minimum 1). This increase is not doubled by Extend Spell.
Acid Dart: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can unleash an acid dart targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. The acid dart deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} + 1 for every two wizard levels you possess. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier. This {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}.
Dimensional Steps: At 8th level, you can use this ability to teleport up to 30 feet as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. You can use this ability a total number of times per day equal to your wizard level.
2b281e46-3359-47df-af71-8859a7ebedac: The corruption of the Worldwound has transformed your shifting body into something fiendish. You have adapted to your new body and grown accustomed to using the evil energy inside you to hunt evil outsiders.
88eefd7a-970d-4b39-9856-e43348a1d5a2: The creature gains a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}. This bonus increases to +4 at 8th level and +6 at 15th level.
84bba1eb-1afb-497f-b052-de42f90cd4dd: The creature gains a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}. This bonus increases to +4 at 8th level and +6 at 15th level.
85e3201a-3c3b-403e-8391-5017dd354c19: The creature gains a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}. This bonus increases to +4 at 8th level and +6 at 15th level.
31d66dce-691a-4a46-9c25-972603d0c4ac: The creature gains a +4 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics checks{/g}. This bonus increases to +6 at 8th level and +8 at 15th level.
b04e6fb0-5f03-4bec-a88a-b9a46a04c8d1: The creature gains a +4 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g}. This bonus increases to +6 at 8th level and +8 at 15th level.
91fb3092-441a-4971-9b24-ba1792b4f20c: The creature gains a +4 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth checks{/g}. This bonus increases to +6 at 8th level and +8 at 15th level.
b9bdb469-44db-4455-bcc2-960fe9e9d4c5: The creature gains a 5-foot enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its base land {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}. This bonus increases to 10 feet at 8th level and 20 feet at 15th level.
5d3d330c-cd0d-4e9c-9b02-d86cf552ff6d: The creature gains evasion, as the rogue class feature. At 12th level, this increases to improved evasion, as the rogue advanced talent.
70e39072-af8c-45d2-8454-dcb6e0e12742: The creature gains one bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
bb66d329-40a3-45f1-913a-9d13503aa161: The creature gains two claw {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} each.
6c6132c5-3787-42d5-a4f8-8c50988bf54e:
The deity Zon-Kuthon, also known as "The Midnight Lord", "The Dark Prince" and "The Prince of Pain", god of darkness, envy, loss, and pain, possesses one of the most twisted and evil minds in the Great Beyond. His position as god of pain is well earned, and he has been the root of countless tortures, murders, and worse throughout time. He was once a benevolent demigod named Dou-Bral, but was corrupted when he traveled to the far, dark places between the planes and returned in his current form. His half-sister, Shelyn, still holds out hope that she can redeem him, though the lord of shadows shows no sign of remorse or compassion.
Domains: Darkness, Death, Destruction, Evil, Law, Undead.
Favored Weapon: Flail
181d4951-453a-4c0c-b303-a76e6d7762db:
The demon lord of portals and riddles, Areshkagal appears as a faceless six-legged female sphinx with midnight blue fur and pale flesh. She torments her worshipers and her prisoners alike with unfair riddles until they go mad and renounce the very reality of their existence. Whispers hold that her true face is too hideous for even the Abyss to bear, but that for brief moments she can reveal it to strike viewers insane or dead.
Domains: Air, Chaos, Evil, Trickery.
Favored Weapon: Sickle
a3326005-9f4f-48c5-9727-e810aa1f9cd1: The devoted servants of nature corrupted, ruined, and destroyed, blight druids are the caretakers of lands ravaged by natural disaster. While some are devoted to reforming and reclaiming lands despoiled by the ravages of civilization, others seek out the more rapacious violence inherent in nature and feed the creeping rot and decay that brings an end to all things.
8f915545-b0f6-495d-8b2f-8f2d02cb6914:
The dinosaur is adept at racing from ambush to deliver grievous wounds with its talons. This aspect infuses the shifter with an enhanced ability to surprise foes and strike first in battle.
Minor Form: You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}. At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, it increases to +6.
Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a medium dinosaur. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +30 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), two talon attacks (1d8 damage), and the pounce ability. At 8th level, you gain two secondary claw attacks (1d4 damage; these attacks cannot use your shifter claws damage) and a +4 racial bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility checks{/g}. At 15th level, you gain a +2 dodge bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, and you can move through {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatened squares{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite, talon
b12f49fb-9531-4daa-a842-7cfd8cb58c87:
The dinosaur is adept at racing from ambush to deliver grievous wounds with its talons. This aspect infuses the shifter with an enhanced ability to surprise foes and strike first in battle. The shifter can shift into her aspect's minor form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. Shifting into a minor form is a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, while ending the effect is a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
Minor Form: You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}. At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, it increases to +6.
7a0eb0b7-0185-4f58-a0ef-e50b0d6f6c33: The divine guardian can intercept a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} against the target of her divine troth ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, taking full {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from that attack and any associated effects.
5c1800aa-68ed-4253-95f5-af9e96dbdba3:
The divine guardian devotes herself to the protection and guardianship of one creature at a time, be that her liege lord, an allied cleric, or an innocent facing overwhelming danger at the hands of evil.
The divine guardian devotes herself to the concerns of the material world, eschewing some divine studies. She does not gain access to divine {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spellcasting{/g}.
f8f33ab6-adeb-48cd-b048-a248db444dd2:
The dread and feared necromancer commands undead and uses the foul power of unlife against his enemies.
Power over Undead: You receive Turn Undead as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. You can channel energy a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier, but only to use this feat. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} against these feats is equal to 10 + 1/2 your wizard level + your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. At 20th level, undead cannot add their channel resistance to the save against this ability.
Grave Touch: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can make a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} that causes a living creature to become shaken for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your wizard level (minimum 1). If you touch a shaken creature with this ability, it becomes frightened for 1 round if it has fewer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} than your wizard level. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier.
Life Sight: At 8th level, you gain blindsight to a range of 10 feet for a number of rounds per day equal to your wizard level. This ability only allows you to detect living creatures and undead creatures. This sight also tells you whether a creature is living or undead. Constructs and other creatures that are neither living nor undead cannot be seen with this ability. The range of this ability increases by 10 feet at 12th level, and by an additional 10 feet for every four levels beyond 12th. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
4ca0686c-8103-479f-9595-99c06e135b07: The eldritch archer rains magical attacks down on her foes.
234d087a-38d2-443b-aca3-ec235d6989c5:
The enchanter uses magic to control and manipulate the minds of his victims.
Enchanting Smile: You gain a +2 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion checks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against Enchantment {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. This bonus increases by +1 for every five wizard levels you possess, up to a maximum of +6 at 20th level.
Dazing Touch: You can cause a living creature to become dazed for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. Creatures with more {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} than your wizard level are unaffected. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier.
Aura of Despair: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of despair for a number of rounds per day equal to your wizard level. Enemies within this aura take a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, saving throws, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. These rounds do not need to be consecutive. This is a mind-affecting effect.
5f31a038-0a6e-4971-9677-d9740bfc7b80: The enlightened philosopher seeks truth through compassion, moderation, and humility. By following her philosophy's teachings, she aspires to reach enlightenment and become one with the universe.
e30cbe34-df9c-4818-99c0-0889fdf7236e: The extremely developed sixth sense of the instinctual warrior allows him to have a {g|Encyclopedia:Blindsense}blindsense{/g} to a range of 30 feet, blindsight to a range of 15 feet.
196a318f-1c17-4a4d-9f14-af81da3a3dfb: The fighter applies his bonus from bravery to all Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}.
69b7fa3e-62af-4037-af3e-c4d8a942ac18: The fighter gains the benefits of the Weapon Finesse {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} with all melee weapons that belong to the associated fighter weapon group. The fighter must have the Weapon Finesse feat before choosing this option.
12a2b378-572c-4d32-b9fe-be68fba9674d: The fighter treats all {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} weapons that belong to the trained weapon group as though they were light weapons when determining his {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} for fighting with two weapons.
8ea57fef-fdbd-4bd8-a29f-31e32cb6670e: The first time a blood kineticist selects water with expanded element, she doesn't gain the cold simple blast or the ice composite blast; instead, she gains the blood composite blast, which costs 2 points of burn. A blood blast is a physical blast that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g}. It is associated with the same infusions as the water blast.
504db8f3-ef24-4fb1-a491-1d6721e5e796: The forester gains a +1 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against demons.
1fda53fc-cc5b-4d36-93f4-2c32b46ff60d: The forester gains a +1 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fire effects.
8bb30d86-3f1f-435d-9bb0-bb250c2d66a7: The forester gains a +4 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletic checks{/g}.
7e515466-4961-41e7-8ae3-c7066672d398: The forester gains a +4 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility checks{/g}.
923ed096-2b8c-424f-90af-b35d13da3757: The forester gains a +4 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g}.
f83cc447-85ed-4c28-adfe-00d968a078ef: The forester walker gains a +4 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion checks{/g}.
0057cd5a-e6b0-48b9-9add-a31a9dc1ba52: The forester's base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} increases by +10 feet.
a75bef4f-9e31-4a54-90b1-1f48782854cb:
The foul corruption of undeath is a part of you. Somewhere in the past, death became infused with your lineage. Your connection to the attributes of the undead bestows frightening power when your bloodrage.
When you enter a bloodrage, the powers of undeath manifest, empowering your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with fear and your body with foul resistances.
Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}Feats{/g}: Diehard, Dodge, Endurance, Intimidating Prowess, Iron Will, Mobility, Toughness.
Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: Snowball (7th), false life (10th), vampiric touch (13th), enervation (16th).
59d20b76-ce67-46c0-9b8c-b1d199013291: The gendarme cares less for the finer points of tactical precision than he does for the exhilaration of the charge: the rush of wind through the visor of his helmet, the feel of his couched lance, the satisfying shriek of armor giving way before his weapon's force as the point drives past metal into his foes.
ff28a0a4-71b1-45d3-b553-2ac125e3ab0a:
The goddess Gyronna is also known as "The Angry Hag," and for good reason. She is not a popular deity, as many fear her and her clergy, which is entirely female. These are usually the victims of the unforgiving and closed-minded, the outcasts of society: disfigured prostitutes, wives caught in adultery, or pregnant teenagers disowned by their parents. Priestesses are renowned for their ability to foster hatred and turn friend against friend. Her priestesses are also known to swap young babies for hideous monstrous creatures birthed from their own womb.
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Madness.
Favored Weapon: Dagger
6a63a7e3-71b7-46a3-80d8-79ddae72728c:
The griffonheart shifter flies straight at her opponent. This ability functions and counts as charging, except that it does not require a clear path to the target and can only be used in combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} also gives an additional +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on attack and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} made as part of the charge.
Charging is a special {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} that allows you to move up to double your normal {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} and attack during the same action.
You must move before your attack, not after. You must move at least 10 feet, directly toward the designated opponent.
After moving, you may make a single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}. You get a +2 bonus on the attack roll and take a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} until the beginning of your next turn.
d1d61877-fe72-4c36-910a-74ed01dedc19: The half-orcs living in the wasteland have long learned a harsh lesson — the fittest survives and the fittest rules. Their shamans do not communicate with spirits. They prefer to forcefully subjugate animals and battle spirits — the only kind of spirits they approve, for those who do not fight and do not serve the strongest are destined to die. Such is the law of the wasteland.
f89137a8-552c-4de4-9ef6-d5d2f2ef71db: The human race is renowned for its quick learning curve and love of taking the best from others. Imitators are geniuses with the ability to memorize and copy fighting styles. While others spend their lives perfecting one technique, imitators are already using a few successfully. In combat, they instantly adapt to the flow of battle, choosing the most appropriate martial style and often improvise, confusing their enemies.
0eb45982-be8f-498c-948e-016b47ee0317: The imitator can make sneak attacks, dealing an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. This damage increases by an additional 1d6 for every 3 slayer levels he has. He also gains Evasion at 4th level and Uncanny Dodge at 8th level.
5d861328-ea05-4003-bfad-5d678d1fa7fa: The imitator gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}. This bonus increases by additional +1 every 5 slayer levels (up to +5). He also gains armor training at 6th and 14th levels.
f5248823-5acd-4ef8-80e6-21f6aff76208: The imitator gains temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit point{/g} equal to his level. He also gains Uncanny Dodge at 4th level and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 1/- at 7th level. This {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} reduction also increases by 1 for every 3 slayer levels after 7th.
f475afc1-8469-42d9-8f74-b9cfcc475867: The imitator gains the Improved Unarmed Strike {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. At 2nd level, while the imitator is unarmored, he gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} equal to half his {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier. He also gains Evasion at 4th level. At 8th level, the imitator's {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g} count as magic and cold iron for the purpose of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. At 11th level, while the imitator is unarmored, he gains an extra unarmed {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, and an additional extra unarmed attack at 20th level.
12c32241-2c70-41de-bf70-be26ffb3a6f6: The infusion discovery allows an alchemist to use his extracts not only on himself but on other people as well. With this discovery, all alchemist extracts will behave exactly like {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} of the same names when considering targets and range.
6a737485-02d0-4374-916b-73797e9172b7: The inquisitor is filled with divine wrath, gaining a +1 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}. This bonus increases by +1 for every three inquisitor levels she possesses.
9aff410d-a495-4cb3-933b-e4a2d5810654: The inquisitor is protected from the vile taint of her foes, gaining a +1 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. This bonus increases by +1 for every five inquisitor levels she possesses. At 10th level, the bonus is doubled against curses, diseases, and poisons.
b522c0ed-10b7-460b-b1db-836cf9e0a1c3: The inquisitor is shielded by a flickering aura, gaining 2 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}energy resistance{/g} against all elements (acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic). The protection increases by 2 for every three inquisitor levels she possesses.
527da1f8-75df-4f35-a97e-0b4121969263: The inquisitor is surrounded by a protective aura, granting a +1 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}. This bonus increases by +1 for every five inquisitor levels she possesses. At 10th level, this bonus is doubled against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} made to confirm {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g} against the inquisitor.
6eaa61e8-60f9-4490-9c45-d739a21f0d46: The inquisitor is surrounded by a {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} light, gaining {g|Encyclopedia:Fast_Healing}fast healing{/g} 1. This causes the inquisitor to heal 1 point of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as long as the inquisitor is alive and the judgment lasts. The amount of healing increases by 1 point for every three inquisitor levels she possesses.
d6f0bc17-cca3-4969-b061-7c87ab598541: The kinetic knight can use her {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score in place of her {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} score when qualifying for combat {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}. This ability counts as having Combat Expertise for the purpose of feat prerequisites.
1ceb3667-560f-4683-8832-f69e68fe06b4: The knife master is a trained killer who specializes in close-up combat and the wave and weave of knife fighting. In her hands, daggers and other similar light blades become truly deadly instruments.
00f74c70-77bc-4896-b65b-ccf0c409bcba: The loremaster is a gatherer and keeper of secrets. He is often obsessed by the written word, with cryptic and arcane lore serving as his devoted mistress. Holding to the adage that knowledge is power, the loremaster often forsakes material wealth and personal glory for rare or unusual information, an endless quest that brings him ever closer to his unattainable goal: perfection through edification. Often rejecting what he views as the pointless affectations and transitory pleasures of his short-sighted neighbors, the loremaster believes that the only worthwhile goal in life is the acquisition of intellectual might. After all, wealth is spent, passions fade, and the power of the body is limited by age, while the mind's capacity to grow greater with time is infinite.
b829f178-b346-44b1-9766-9847a8c58799:
The magus can add the anarchic property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool, but this consumes 2 points of enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted to this weapon.
An anarchic weapon is infused with the power of chaos. It makes the weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}chaotic-aligned{/g} and thus overcomes the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. It deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against all creatures of lawful alignment.
f2b92a33-7056-40d1-a3e7-f57c95593f5e:
The magus can add the axiomatic property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool, but this consumes 2 points of enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted to this weapon.
An axiomatic weapon is infused with lawful power. It makes the weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}lawful-aligned{/g} and thus overcomes the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. It deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against creatures of chaotic alignment.
6650c960-b6ec-46b7-8b4f-95a77c1d19fb:
The magus can add the brilliant energy property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool, but this consumes 4 points of enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted to this weapon.
A brilliant energy weapon ignores nonliving matter. Armor and shield bonuses to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} (including any enhancement bonuses to that armor) do not count against it because the weapon passes through armor. ({g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, deflection, dodge, natural armor, and other such bonuses still apply.) A brilliant energy weapon cannot harm undead, constructs, or objects.
c7b63599-5388-44d9-9745-9ec876a21bc2:
The magus can add the flaming property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool, but this consumes 1 point of enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted to this weapon.
A flaming weapon is sheathed in fire that deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} on a successful hit. The fire does not harm the wielder.
af295e07-f8f1-4886-acd6-655b570a378a:
The magus can add the frost property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool, but this consumes 1 point of enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted to this weapon.
A frost weapon is sheathed in a terrible, icy cold that deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} on a successful hit. The cold does not harm the wielder.
93f8dc3c-5e92-454c-9275-3cb010b86237:
The magus can add the ghost touch property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool, but this consumes 1 point of enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted to this weapon.
A ghost touch weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} normally against incorporeal creatures, regardless of its bonus. An incorporeal creature's 50% reduction in damage from corporeal sources does not apply to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made against it with ghost touch weapons.
b1bb308b-bfe2-4c63-b3ce-74e67532c534:
The magus can add the holy property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool, but this consumes 2 points of enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted to this weapon.
A holy weapon is imbued with holy power. This power makes the weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good-aligned{/g} and thus overcomes the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. It deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against all creatures of evil alignment.
58f06e48-d1a0-4d0f-9e21-eb2fd532cfb5:
The magus can add the keen property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool, but this consumes 1 point of enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted to this weapon.
The keen property doubles the threat range of a weapon. This benefit doesn't stack with any other effects that expand the threat range of a weapon (such as the keen edge {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} or the Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}Critical{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}).
7949d0c8-e5af-4c65-9c43-0a0aee2c1dde:
The magus can add the shock property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool, but this consumes 1 point of enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted to this weapon.
A shock weapon is sheathed in crackling electricity that deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} on a successful hit. The electricity does not harm the wielder.
da5e0980-3df6-4b1d-9cea-ba7a6ecc6b50:
The magus can add the speed property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool, but this consumes 3 points of enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted to this weapon.
When making a full {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, the wielder of a speed weapon may make one extra attack with it. The attack uses the wielder's full {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g}, plus any modifiers appropriate to the situation. (This benefit is not cumulative with similar effects, such as a haste {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.)
dc0b32d6-746c-4a99-a574-3965525505d9:
The magus can add the unholy property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool, but this consumes 2 points of enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted to this weapon.
An unholy weapon is imbued with unholy power. This power makes the weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil-aligned{/g} and thus overcomes the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. It deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against all creatures of good alignment.
551fb73e-d144-46f0-a8c2-1ec95bf6d532: The magus can cast three {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} per day as if those spells were modified by the Empower Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
2c0acb29-bde2-489e-97c3-bcfa66369c23: The magus can cast three {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} per day as if those spells were modified by the Extend Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
f876f04f-fbff-4315-840f-da1fddf4abb4: The magus can cast three {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} per day as if those spells were modified by the Maximize Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
53844b79-dad4-4fd3-ae01-d9bf416d48ec: The magus can cast three {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} per day as if those spells were modified by the Quicken Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
ccf0c337-75eb-4ae1-bacb-751d1a7289e5: The magus can cast three {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} per day as if those spells were modified by the Reach Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
2fca1af9-5bd8-4773-ba98-fbc0008439df: The magus can expend 1 point from his arcane pool as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, allowing him to anticipate his opponent's defenses. Enemies are denied their {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} bonus against the magus's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} until the end of the magus's next turn.
5a4e5c12-7bdd-4370-b715-3bbb83377414: The magus can expend 1 point from his arcane pool as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to grant himself an insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to his {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} until the end of his turn.
b9183d35-2036-4dd8-b311-e85cf5e3d4ea: The magus can expend 1 point from his arcane pool as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to grant himself an insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to his {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} until the end of his turn.
6b253e52-1a75-4b9e-8a0f-f032813416d6: The magus can expend 1 point from his arcane pool as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to move more quickly. This functions as haste, but only targets the magus and lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to the magus's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} bonus.
cd6a99a8-df48-4ce2-bd0f-d335c18cb49d: The magus can expend 1 point from his arcane pool as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to move more quickly. This functions as haste, but only targets the magus and lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to the magus's {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus.
01ef5dcb-60cb-4038-9330-fa867160fc6a: The magus can expend 2 points from his arcane pool as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to resolve all of his melee weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} until the end of his turn as melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attacks{/g}.
67305378-4cdd-458f-957d-6925a8b3ca32:
The magus can spend 1 additional point to add the bane property to a weapon enhanced with his arcane pool. All enemies count as designated foes for this weapon.
A bane weapon excels against certain foes. Against a designated foe, the weapon's enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is +2 better than its actual bonus. It also deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against such foes.
eea791ef-ffc6-4e87-9970-55ea4b9d5400: The magus can activate a wand or staff in place of casting a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} when using spell combat.
56a4b232-38c0-4bb4-82c4-36cbab38dd9f: The martyr's aura of courage, aura of resolve, and aura of righteousness have a radius of 20 feet instead of 10 feet, but the martyr does not gain immunity to fear, charms, or compulsions from those abilities.
5e77137a-97de-4b46-8e3a-b75d179d032b: The monk attempts to sweep his foe's leg, knocking the opponent down. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} hits, the monk can make a free trip attempt against the target of this strike (using the {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} of the attack used to hit the foe). This trip attempt does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}.
78966664-ef63-47bb-990e-d83dc6e63d92: The monk delivers a brutal punch that can penetrate defenses. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} hits, it bypasses any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} or hardness possessed by the target of that attack.
7a5024a7-ce1a-427f-95cd-4b778f4dedef: The monk links his hands together, swinging both arms like a club and dealing tremendous {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} hits, the monk {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} his {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strike damage twice, adding both rolls together before applying {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and other modifiers to the damage. This bonus damage is not multiplied on a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}.
f80110cd-0ee9-4163-9c44-62f896136a90: The monk possesses a pool of ki energy that they can use to empower their {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} or activate {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special abilities{/g}. The ki pool replenishes when the monk rests. As the monk advances, they gain new {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} and powers that use the ki pool.
6c840bf5-82ba-4e2c-a638-086f7eca0fd8: The monk spins about, confounding his foe. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} hits, the monk gains a +4 dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against any attacks made by the target of the style strike until the start of his next turn. This bonus does not stack with itself.
99ccece6-65e3-47a8-95fa-64684c12c0a7:
The next {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} the wizard casts will be altered as though using the Reach Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every two wizard levels you possess beyond 8th.
Reach Spell: You can alter a spell with a range of touch, close, or medium to increase its range by one range category, using the following order: touch, close, medium, and long. Spells modified by this feat that require melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attacks{/g} instead require ranged touch {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
492ca406-0eac-4f72-ae72-1ed7fc3fd628:
The next {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} the wizard casts will be cast as if extended as though using the Extend Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every two wizard levels you possess beyond 8th.
Extend Spell: An extended spell lasts twice as long as normal. A spell with a duration of {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration{/g}, instantaneous, or permanent is not affected by this feat.
fd0a9336-dc79-4bc0-bd6c-155c45f9c4b3: The otherworldly powers of winter witches are inextricably linked with the frozen outer-realms.
6ab87e60-0b0c-4f3a-931d-6f63da06e0c4: The path of the student of war is particularly enticing to martially minded characters who seek to enhance and expand their mastery of skills. Students of war often pride themselves in studying topics that combat-focused types might not normally find value in, and their ability to draw upon unexpected lore and information has become something of a legend among their kind.
2b11d5f8-6756-4099-8227-caeadfa24eba:
The power of the elements resides in you, and at times you can hardly control its fury. This influence comes either from an elemental outsider in your family history or from a moment when you or your ancestors were exposed to a powerful elemental force or cataclysm.
One of the four elements infuses your being, and you can draw upon its power while bloodraging. A number of your abilities deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and grant resistances based on your element.
Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}Feats{/g}: Cleave, Dodge, Great Fortitude, Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}Initiative{/g}, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack, Weapon Focus.
Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: Burning hands* (7th), scorching ray* (10th), protection from energy (13th), elemental body I (16th). (Spells marked with an asterisk [*] always deal a type of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}energy damage{/g} determined by your element, regardless of the spell's normal effects. In addition, the subtype of these spells changes to match the energy type of your element.)
f3041793-f0c7-4c3e-aff6-386ce23fb680:
The power of the elements resides in you, and at times you can hardly control its fury. This influence comes from an elemental outsider in your family history or a time when you or your relatives were exposed to a powerful elemental force. Air infuses your being, and you can draw upon its power in times of need.
Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}Feats{/g} of the Elemental Bloodline: Dodge, Empower Spell, Great Fortitude, Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}Initiative{/g}, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_Arcana}Knowledge (arcana){/g}), Weapon Finesse.
c7079ff6-6eda-47a5-a2a1-0da5d0f5aa11:
The power of the elements resides in you, and at times you can hardly control its fury. This influence comes from an elemental outsider in your family history or a time when you or your relatives were exposed to a powerful elemental force. Earth infuses your being, and you can draw upon its power in times of need.
Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}Feats{/g} of the Elemental Bloodline: Dodge, Empower Spell, Great Fortitude, Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}Initiative{/g}, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_Arcana}Knowledge (arcana){/g}), Weapon Finesse.
3459cfd0-3bb0-4711-abc9-c55081523e27:
The power of the elements resides in you, and at times you can hardly control its fury. This influence comes from an elemental outsider in your family history or a time when you or your relatives were exposed to a powerful elemental force. Fire infuses your being, and you can draw upon its power in times of need.
Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}Feats{/g} of the Elemental Bloodline: Dodge, Empower Spell, Great Fortitude, Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}Initiative{/g}, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_Arcana}Knowledge (arcana){/g}), Weapon Finesse.
6adad984-fddd-497a-8c5c-e45e2e621e5d:
The power of the elements resides in you, and at times you can hardly control its fury. This influence comes from an elemental outsider in your family history or a time when you or your relatives were exposed to a powerful elemental force. Water infuses your being, and you can draw upon its power in times of need.
Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}Feats{/g} of the Elemental Bloodline: Dodge, Empower Spell, Great Fortitude, Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}Initiative{/g}, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_Arcana}Knowledge (arcana){/g}), Weapon Finesse.
41a1e3cf-f305-4a2b-9413-3193c4c166f1: The proud and fearless griffon is a creature dedicated to protecting its territory. These regal beasts are revered as symbols of freedom and strength in many cultures.
284a1955-68b7-478e-a2fb-5b02afb9cf4d: The purifier seeks out signs of possession or mind control that manifest from unwilling (and often unwitting) servants for fiendish corruptors and their mortal minions. A purifier seeks liberation of mind, body, and spirit from the bondage of sin and the taint of the unholy.
2b1a4a94-bc88-4550-a314-00a3b2afe51d: The rageshaper's {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} rolls, melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, thrown weapon damage rolls, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saves{/g} while raging increases to +3. In addition, the amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} gained when entering a rage increases to 3 per {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Die{/g}. Also, the rageshaper can grow up to a maximum of two {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} categories larger, and the damage die of his ground slam ability increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d8{/g}.
eba79e47-202a-42af-b4ed-d604871acda4: The rageshaper's {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} rolls, melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, thrown weapon damage rolls, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saves{/g} while raging increases to +4. In addition, the amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} gained when entering a rage increases to 4 per {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Die{/g}. Also, the rageshaper gains a +4 racial bonus to his {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} and the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with his slam {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} in devastating form, and the damage die of his ground slam ability increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d10{/g}.
c2933bcc-d9bc-435f-a5b2-f9e4f850c957: The rogue becomes so confident in the use of certain {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} that she can use them reliably even under adverse conditions. When making a {g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_World}Knowledge (world){/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_Arcana}Knowledge (arcana){/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g}, she may take 10 even if stress and distractions would normally prevent her from doing so. A rogue can choose not to take 10 and can instead {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} normally.
8b49e90f-5c32-4c62-9e3c-f08e840edf6b: The rogue becomes so confident in the use of certain {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} that she can use them reliably even under adverse conditions. When making a {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Religion}Lore (religion) skill check{/g}, she may take 10 even if stress and distractions would normally prevent her from doing so. A rogue can choose not to take 10 and can instead {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} normally.
ddeb49ce-7d7c-4951-9e65-c488d73d203b: The rogue becomes so confident in the use of certain {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} that she can use them reliably even under adverse conditions. When making a {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery skill check{/g}, she may take 10 even if stress and distractions would normally prevent her from doing so. A rogue can choose not to take 10 and can instead {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} normally.
a443196c-8e1e-48ba-aecc-473dc006463b: The rogue gains Trip as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, even if she does not meet the prerequisites.
4175fef2-cf86-4d6b-9fca-65563037da27: The scaled fist can expend 1 point from her ki pool as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to imbue her {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} with acid, causing them to deal an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 her monk level.
b477c997-e0b2-4bdb-b499-f4d57a540fd3: The scaled fist can expend 1 point from her ki pool as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to imbue her {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} with cold, causing them to deal an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 her monk level.
f8d06a49-c6f6-4c00-ad72-2065fbe2009f: The scaled fist can expend 1 point from her ki pool as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to imbue her {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} with electricity, causing them to deal an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 her monk level.
627231cd-e0ef-4104-acb1-63a25b3a9a58: The scaled fist can expend 1 point from her ki pool as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to imbue her {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} with fire, causing them to deal an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 her monk level.
99d9b13c-a3c4-43de-8672-5ec57a53fab3: The sensei is a revered teacher who imparts lessons on the oneness of mind, body, and spirit, along with occasional correction that is subtle and swift. Rather than using wisdom for his own benefit alone, he uses it to better those around him.
738641ca-79b1-4903-bddb-a42ed7f261fa: The shaman afflicts a creature within 30 feet with hypothermia. The target must attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}. On a failed save, the target is fatigued for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. At 8th and 16th levels, the duration of this hex is extended by 1 round. Whether or not the save is successful, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.
b78d2e56-165e-4f07-871c-9a6ff22d8514: The shaman calls upon her spirit to enhance the speed of her {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} abilities. This ability allows her to channel positive energy or cast a cure {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
662ddbcf-9d72-478a-88b9-d2e367b8447f: The shaman can adapt to a specific situation by forming a temporary bond with a wandering spirit that would grant them new {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities. Such a spirit can be changed every day.
fa312eb7-e548-4f0d-8389-21763f87ce0e: The shaman can call upon some of the majesty and power of dragons to cow her enemies. The shaman gains Dazzling Display as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, even if she does not meet the prerequisites, and she can use it even when not wielding a weapon.
c20235f3-5d98-488c-a055-16f3ae18a9a5: The shaman can cause a creature within 30 feet to suffer grave misfortune for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Anytime the creature makes an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability check{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g}, it must {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} twice and take the worse result. A Will save negates this hex. At 8th level and 16th level, the duration of this hex is extended by 1 round. This hex affects all rolls the target must make while it lasts. Whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.
d0cb7e3b-a276-41a2-a128-5c86eea79287:
The shaman can cause fate to twist so that it benefits a creature within 30 feet for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Whenever that creature is targeted by an effect that requires an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g}, including weapon attacks, the attacker must {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} twice and take the worse result.
At 8th level and 16th level, the duration of this hex is extended by 1 round. A shaman cannot use this ability on herself. Hexes that affect the fortune hex, such as cackle, also affect protective luck.
757cb8cb-3089-4908-abf6-e9681c73e744: The shaman can channel positive energy like a cleric, using her shaman level as her effective cleric level when determining the amount of damage {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} (or dealt to undead) and the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g}. The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 1 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
98ad4277-6c05-4361-9628-7a51461f496a: The shaman can grant a creature within 30 feet a bit of good luck for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. The target can call upon this good luck, allowing him to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}reroll{/g} any {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability check{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g}, taking the better result. At 8th level and 16th level, the duration of this hex is extended by 1 round. Once a creature has benefited from the fortune hex, it cannot benefit from it again for 24 hours.
91894506-f4a7-456c-9b4d-cc81b80cd3ea: The shaman can spontaneously cast summon nature's ally {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} as a druid. In addition, all animals within 30 feet of the shaman receive a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to the shaman's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
ba5e8ed6-4922-459d-9428-df6caa8d5f67: The shaman can touch a creature to protect it from negative conditions and suppress their effects. The shaman chooses one of the following conditions each time she uses this hex: dazzled, fatigued, shaken, or sickened. If the target is afflicted with the chosen condition, that condition is suppressed for a number of minutes equal to the shaman's level. Additionally, the shaman grants her target a +4 circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against effects that cause the chosen conditions for 24 hours. A creature can benefit from the hex twice in 24 hours, once for each of two different conditions.
69c916fe-cfee-4b35-a93a-71b5c287b81c: The shaman can touch a willing creature (including herself) and grants a ward of wind. This ward lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to the shaman's level. When a warded creature is {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacked{/g} with an arrow, ray, or other {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attack{/g} that requires an attack roll, that attack suffers a 20% miss chance. At 8th level, the ward lasts for 1 minute for every level the shaman possesses. At 16th level, the miss chance increases to 50%. Once affected, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.
b6618be7-d908-4e24-8118-ff41b559a33a: The shaman can unleash a torrent of ice and water from her hands in a 15-foot cone as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. This torrent deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} per 2 shaman levels she possesses, and bull rushes every enemy, using {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier for the roll. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} halves the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and negates the bull rush. The shaman can use this ability three times per day.
f5a4c190-bdfc-4820-8040-1b8b8510ad26: The shaman causes a creature within 30 feet to become slightly magnetic until the end of the shaman's next turn. Whenever the creature is {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacked{/g} with a melee or ranged weapon constructed primarily of metal, it takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. At 8th and 16th levels, the penalty increases by –2 and the duration extends by 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Once affected, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.
3403728f-70ca-4cc2-8980-13576ed339fb: The shaman causes a creature within 30 feet to become {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Vulnerability}vulnerable{/g} to fire until the end of the shaman's next turn. If the creature is already vulnerable to fire, this hex has no effect. Fire {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistances{/g} apply as normal, and any {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} allowed by the effect that caused the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} reduces it as normal. At 8th and 16th levels, the duration of this hex is extended by 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. A creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.
f075a087-7a89-4df5-9744-b41a73a19280: The shaman causes a creature within 30 feet to gain a nimbus of fire. Though this doesn't harm the creature, it does cause the creature to emit light like a torch, preventing it from gaining any benefit from {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} or invisibility. The target also takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} or effects with fire descriptor. The fire nimbus lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to the shaman's level. A successful Will saving throw negates this effect. Whether or not the save is successful, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.
0f4174b2-9f69-415b-8a49-fda283580411: The shaman causes a creature within 30 feet to take a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to the shaman's level. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} reduces this to just 1 round. At 8th level, the penalty becomes –4. Whether or not the save is successful, a creature affected by a hampering hex cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.
853bf391-3c1c-4657-a174-bc6192f38121: The shaman causes one creature within 30 feet to become more susceptible to the sapping powers of cold for 1 minute.
