e1cb713a-1387-4859-9eab-fa4888931807: You can transform yourself into whirlwind and back again. A whirlwind is 40 feet wide, and every creature that spends a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} in the whirlwind must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} or take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g}. While in whirlwind form, you cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, but you are able to use your abilities.
f603117b-e37a-41a9-bddc-206722b5efc4:
You can use dispel magic to end one ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that has been cast on a creature.
You make one dispel {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d20{/g} + your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) and compare that to the spell with highest caster level ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 11 + the spell's caster level). If successful, that spell ends. If not, compare the same result to the spell with the next highest caster level. Repeat this process until you have dispelled one spell affecting the target, or you have failed to dispel every spell.
At 8th level, the witch doctor can choose to lose any prepared magic spell that is 3rd level or higher in order to spontaneously cast dispel magic or remove curse. This ability can only target a spell effect that is on an ally (including herself ). If she forfeits a magic spell higher than 3rd level, she gains a +2 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on her caster level check to dispel the spell or to remove the curse for every spell level higher than 3rd that she sacrifices.
23a1f126-616e-4acc-8cf9-b3f1ca1e49d5: You can use your {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} (for intimidation) {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} to cause an opponent to become shaken for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. This shaken condition doesn't stack with other shaken conditions to make an affected creature frightened. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} is equal to 10 + the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} + the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier. If you are successful, the target is shaken for one round. This duration increases by 1 round for every 5 by which you beat the DC. You can only threaten an opponent this way if it is within 30 feet and can clearly see and hear you. Using demoralize on the same creature only extends the duration; it does not create a stronger fear condition.
543b0378-3213-4057-bdcb-ff825040da4d: You can, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, use one of your uses of channel positive energy to cause all undead within 30 feet of you to flee, as if frightened. Undead receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to negate the effect. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} for this Will save is equal to 10 + half your wizard level + your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier. Undead that fail their save flee for 1 minute.[LONGSTART] Undead receive a new saving throw each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} to end the effect. If you use channel energy in this way, it has no other effect (it does not {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} or harm nearby creatures).[LONGEND]
68051498-2346-490d-9420-074170c6a509: You cause your melee weapon to fly from your grasp and strike a foe before instantly returning to you. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can make a single {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} using a melee weapon at a range of 30 feet. This attack is treated as a {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attack{/g} with a thrown weapon, except that you add your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier on the attack roll instead of your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier ({g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} still relies on {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}). This ability cannot be used to perform a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier.
ab263f8f-d607-449a-b566-2b6ec940ba02: You constantly surround yourself with a whirling torrent of air, crackling arcs of lightning, or both to protect yourself from {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g}. All ranged {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made with physical weapons suffer a 20% miss chance against you. This ability has no effect on ray attacks. The miss chance increases by 5% for every 5 kineticist levels you possess beyond 2nd. By accepting 1 point of burn, you can increase the miss chance by 5% until the next time your burn is removed. You can continue to accept points of burn to increase the miss chance further, up to a maximum of 75%.
8cc4fe67-69f8-40ef-8be0-f7197a2144bd:
You embrace the madness that lurks deep in your heart, and can unleash it to drive your foes insane or to sacrifice certain abilities to hone others.
Vision of Madness: You can give a creature a vision of madness as a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. Choose one of the following: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. The target receives a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to the chosen {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum +1) and a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to the other two types of rolls equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum –1). This effect fades after 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
Aura of Madness: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of madness for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Enemies within this aura are affected by confusion unless they make a Will save with a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} equal to 10 + 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain + your Wisdom modifier. The confusion effect ends immediately when the creature leaves the area or the aura expires. Creatures that succeed on their saving throw are immune to this aura for 24 hours.
Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: cause fear, cacophonous call, rage, confusion, feeblemind, phantasmal killer, insanity, frightful aspect, weird.
cdd41465-37b8-4531-9b15-2112e8e3ddb8:
You find solace in the green, can grow defensive thorns, and can communicate with plants.
Enlarge: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can enlarge yourself for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, as if you were the target of the enlarge person {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. You can use this power a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
Bramble Armor: At 6th level, you can cause a host of wooden thorns to burst from your skin as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. While bramble armor is in effect, any foe striking you with a melee weapon without {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} + 1 point per two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
52d6745a-388f-4d84-89f7-0f8b3e20987e:
You find solace in the green, can grow defensive thorns, and can communicate with plants.
Enlarge: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} you can enlarge yourself for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, as if you were the target of the enlarge person {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. a7745b0e-a951-4f0a-a67c-48bbbe447c6c:
You follow a strict and ordered code of laws, and in so doing, achieve enlightenment.
Touch of Law: You can touch a willing creature as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, infusing it with the power of divine order and allowing it to treat all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as if the natural {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d20{/g} roll resulted in an 11. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
Staff of Order: At 8th level, you can give a weapon you touch the axiomatic special weapon quality for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.
Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: protection from chaos, communal protection from chaos, prayer, communal protection from energy, dominate person, blade barrier, dictum, shield of law, dominate monster.
b7c8e728-bb1f-43a6-a9c2-ac05b3d0a5e6: You gain Weapon Focus. At 8th level, you gain Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}Critical{/g}. At 12th level, you gain Greater Weapon Focus. You do not need to meet the prerequisites to receive these {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}.
ee3d177a-04e4-4556-813f-04a744529739: You gain a +1 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to one physical {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}). This bonus increases by +1 for every five wizard levels you possess to a maximum of +5 at 20th level. You can change this bonus to a new ability score once per day. At 20th level, this bonus applies to two physical ability scores of your choice.
9c3b8d3a-ad8f-45eb-a2b1-7c0b9f8114a3: You gain a +1 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}. This bonus increases by +1 for every five wizard levels you possess to a maximum of +5 at 20th level. At 20th level, this bonus applies to two physical {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} of your choice.
f529895f-78f7-48b2-94b4-b49ae7083b29: You gain a +1 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}. This bonus increases by +1 for every five wizard levels you possess to a maximum of +5 at 20th level. At 20th level, this bonus applies to two physical {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} of your choice.
ded325a2-f8f1-4450-8811-faec0ea04f23: You gain a +1 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}. This bonus increases by +1 for every five wizard levels you possess to a maximum of +5 at 20th level. At 20th level, this bonus applies to two physical {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} of your choice.
fd730993-0a58-456c-9835-784225a4fd23: You gain a +2 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against diseases, mind-affecting effects, and poisons. At 7th level, this bonus also applies on saves against death effects, sleep effects, and stunning. At 11th level, the bonus increases to +4
5a11f21e-edf2-413e-a616-44d0fd02d3b6: You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects. At 7th level, the bonus increases to +4.
5d855146-c106-4e2f-b85f-8ed49dd1e3b4: You gain a bonus combat feat.
016b59e1-8c65-4d31-8c77-662eaaf480bf: You gain a pair of wings that grant a +3 dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} and immunity to ground-based effects, such as difficult terrain.
9e24bf1a-655c-46bb-a3f5-b456091b2fea: You gain proficiency in all {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}martial weapons{/g} and heavy armor.
9d1cad2c-9769-48ce-b33b-94b12d8b0ff1: You gain resistance 5 to an energy type of your choice, chosen when you prepare {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. This resistance can be changed each day. At 11th level, this resistance increases to 10. At 20th level, this resistance changes to immunity to the chosen energy type.
551c0586-28ef-4f11-8869-b853aedbf171: You gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}supernatural ability{/g} to make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} with a morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1).
7eb48ae5-f7f1-4c58-bbfe-df6f975d763b: You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} (20% miss chance) and a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth checks{/g}.
cb8e4300-87ab-46ae-9692-8efdfa19316e: You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} acid 5. This resistance increases to 10 at 5th level and 20 at 11th level. At 17th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to acid.
67c25d53-0e35-4e44-acb1-a29068db9479: You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} cold 5. This resistance increases to 10 at 5th level and 20 at 11th level. At 17th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to cold.
46048e06-059b-44f7-bacc-c5970cedfa66: You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} electricity 5. This resistance increases to 10 at 5th level and 20 at 11th level. At 17th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to electricity.
6b182d27-78c4-4985-8d1b-1e1b7a134c30: You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} fire 5. This resistance increases to 10 at 5th level and 20 at 11th level. At 17th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to fire.
cf0275dd-71f6-4bbe-a6a7-8e3946457daa: You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 11 + your arcanist level.
dfd27cf7-27c4-4c0c-b2a3-10cbf2cb962a: You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 6 + your arcanist level.
6a4f7204-e60d-488a-bd01-aa81e3002d78: You get a powerful undead minion — a skeletal champion that specializes in archery. It will become more powerful as you gain new mythic ranks. Just like your companions, this skeletal champion can use any items and also has all the {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiencies{/g}. Being undead, it is also subject to all the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} undead get being under the command of the Mythic Lich.
8387552d-0540-4193-8c45-c461d8b2e567: You get a powerful undead minion — a skeletal champion that specializes in defense. It will become more powerful as you gain new mythic ranks. 075194d1-bf10-4e6b-a74c-a4fb5c1aee97: You get a powerful undead minion — a skeletal champion that specializes in devastating {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}two-handed{/g} weapons. 962c9d46-8388-47c7-b79d-3d12f1344fe4: You get a powerful undead minion — a skeletal champion that specializes in fast {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with two weapons. f2f4e239-e417-49eb-b1f3-eb80486e8650: You get a powerful undead minion — a skeletal champion. It will become more powerful as you gain new mythic ranks. 3ea65376-b2b8-4520-b816-b4c15a1dfb89: You have -2 penalty on concentration checks.
5f73e029-ac96-4d41-9737-b21d569cf861: You have a +8 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and total {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}, but you can't take any {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g} except moving.
6443ecb5-8cba-423e-adf6-f1f24bd0196e: You have become so attuned to the whispers of the natural world, from the croaking of frogs to the groaning of great boulders, that your surroundings constantly keep you preternaturally aware of danger. You may add your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier, instead of your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier, to your {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}. Any condition that would cause you to lose your Dexterity modifier to your Armor Class instead causes you to lose your Charisma modifier to your Armor Class.
35dedcd5-6f60-40c0-89fc-6eeacf500f4d:
You have mastery over earth, metal, and stone, can fire darts of acid, and command earth creatures.
Acid Dart: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can unleash an acid dart targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. This acid dart deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} + 1 point for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
Acid Resistance: At 6th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} acid 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to acid.

1f503fc9-0428-4537-b1dd-31fa4bae21c9:
You have pledged your life and soul to goodness and purity.
Touch of Good: You can touch a creature as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, granting a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to half your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1) for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.
Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: protection from evil, communal protection from evil, prayer, forced repentance, burst of glory, summon monster VI, holy word, holy aura, summon monster IX.
07ff88a7-9471-4673-88f6-823a0f52462c: You imbue your {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} with elemental energy. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, your melee attacks deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of additional {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of your energy type.
58c0f26d-bd24-42e6-a8f3-7956e5c0534a:
You manipulate shadows and darkness.
Touch of Darkness: As a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}, you can cause a creature's vision to be fraught with shadows and darkness. The creature touched treats all other creatures as if they had {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}, suffering a 20% miss chance on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}. This effect lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
Moonfire: At 8th level, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} you can shoot a blast of divine moonlight from your eyes, as a ranged touch attack against a single target within 30 feet. Moonfire deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per 2 levels in the class that gave you access to this domain, and the target is dazzled for 1 round per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Moonfire deals 1d10 points of damage per level in the class that gave you access to this domain against lycanthropes. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and one additional time per day for every 4 levels beyond 8th.

19ac750e-84ce-40ea-a4cb-f64f78830ecf: You must have at least one hand free (holding nothing) to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} when you would normally be hit with an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} from a ranged weapon, you may deflect it so that you take no {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from it. de64b1f7-cbd8-4523-bce2-0ae6edf3d46e: You next arcanist {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} will have increased {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.

37c3a063-698c-444b-a541-1dc1a4dbce63: You receive a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}Combat Maneuver Defense{/g} against bull rush, grapple, and trip attempts. 60eda744-12db-4132-8acc-cf221f4c2b81: You receive a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}Combat Maneuver Defense{/g} when resisting a bull rush or trip attempt while standing on the ground. You revel in ruin and devastation, and can deliver particularly destructive {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
Destructive Smite: You gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}supernatural ability{/g} to make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} with a morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1).

These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: true strike, boneshaker, rage, fear, boneshatter, harm, disintegrate, horrid wilting, tsunami.
894e5ca0-3e8b-4e19-aaa2-a863f9ef866b:
You see death not as something to be feared, but as a final rest and reward for a life well spent. The taint of undeath is a mockery of what you hold dear.
Gentle Rest: Your touch can fill a creature with lethargy, causing a living creature to become staggered for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. If you touch a staggered living creature, that creature falls asleep for 1 round instead. Undead creatures touched are staggered for a number of rounds equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Ward Against Death: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura that wards against death for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Living creatures in this area are immune to all death effects, energy drain, and effects that cause negative levels. This ward does not remove negative levels that a creature has already gained, but the negative levels have no effect while the creature is inside the warded area. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
685a8bf5-9274-40b9-8651-d305fc26919b:

Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: doom, scare, vampiric touch, death ward, slay living, undeath to death, destruction, waves of exhaustion, wail of the banshee.
7abb714e-a980-48d1-b14a-b13c454c5f52:
You see truth in the pure and burning light of the sun, and can call upon its blessing or wrath to work great deeds.
Sun's Blessing: Whenever you channel positive energy to harm undead creatures, add your level in the class that gave you access to this domain to the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt. Undead do not add their channel resistance to their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} when you channel positive energy.
Nimbus of Light: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot nimbus of light for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Any hostile creature within this radius must succeed at a Fortitude save to resist the effects of this aura. If the creature fails, it is blinded until it leaves the area of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. A creature that has resisted the effect cannot be affected again by this particular aura. In addition, undead within this radius take an amount of damage equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain each round that they remain inside the nimbus. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Domain Spells: faerie fire, see invisibility, searing light, shield of dawn, flame strike, chains of light, sunbeam, sunburst, elemental swarm (fire).
9bb96ea9-7564-471c-9227-37ae2c2c0981:
You suffer from minor ailments and sicknesses. While you struggle to resist new diseases, you have grown accustomed to the many inconveniences of sickness.
You take a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against disease effects, but you are immune to the sickened condition.
At 5th level, add pox pustules to your list of 2nd-level oracle {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} known.
At 10th level, increase the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of any disease effect you create by +2.
At 15th level, you are immune to the effects of disease.
f1fe2ec1-a0de-4d33-962f-194a0a152541: You take no {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from non-magic weapons, you also take only half damage from any source not dealing ghost, holy, divine, or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}force damage{/g}.
c4a7d7ef-3aa7-408b-8cd3-d07290dbc8bc: You take no {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from non-magic weapons. You also take only half damage from any source of damage other than ghost touch, holy, divine, or force.
38209012-6855-453e-858d-379233472015: You take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} at the start of each of your turns, and can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} to extinguish the flames.
44ac983b-53bc-432c-bf4e-f8cc739f5cba: Your animal companion becomes proficient with Heavy Barding.
347a1a35-30b7-4662-bcb2-291d6a5dcd13: Your animal companion becomes proficient with Light Barding.
523ca413-bb6e-40eb-bb07-b981c4942ff8: Your animal companion becomes proficient with Medium Barding.
52859ece-0afa-4082-ac3b-e0a5b2980226: Your base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} increases by 10 feet. At 10th level, you ignore difficult terrain. Oracles with the lame oracle curse cannot select this revelation.
60e8c9f6-0765-4b82-b22a-5c7951887301: Your base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} increases by 10 feet. At 5th level, once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, you gain a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against the first {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}. At 10th level, you can teleport a medium distance as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. You can teleport a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
f9f3823c-d679-436a-8cbe-c84bf3ad93ae:
Your bloodline carries the lingering stain of ancient serpent races that ruled when the world was young; your forebears were likely favored slaves anointed by their reptilian masters and gifted with their cold cunning and subtle manipulation. While deception and a mesmeric charm are your birthright, you may struggle for truth in spite of your heritage. The treacherous and yet hypnotic serpent's blood that flows through you taints your magic with a sinuous and seductive grace.
Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}Feats{/g} of the Serpentine Bloodline: Combat Casting, Combat Reflexes, Deceitful, Deft Hands, Persuasive, Reach {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spell{/g}, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g}), Stealthy.
8ad34c90-a7d0-46e0-b5cb-55ff64bb497a:
Your bloodline is blessed by a celestial power, either from a celestial ancestor or through divine intervention. Although this power drives you along the path of good, your fate (and alignment) is your own to determine. Your celestial heritage grants you a great many powers, but they come at a price. The lords of the higher planes are watching you and your actions closely.
Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}Feats{/g} of the Celestial Bloodline: Dodge, Extend Spell, Iron Will, Agile Maneuvers, Augment Summoning, Superior Summoning, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Religion}Lore (religion){/g}), Weapon Finesse.
bd1c1d47-9234-4b25-b69e-6cd9e4298c57:
Your body is slowly rotting away.
You take a –4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g}-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, except for {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} when used to intimidate. You gain a +4 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} made against disease.
At 5th level, you are immune to the sickened condition (but not nauseated).
At 10th level, you gain immunity to disease.
At 15th level, you are immune to the nauseated condition.
e81cc88b-1613-4b08-8faf-4238247aafd1: Your breath weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}8d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} in a 40-foot cone and allows a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} for half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
f8543225-91d3-4fb1-b826-0016339a8a20: Your breath weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}8d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} in an 80-foot line and allows a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} for half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
8c6fbf06-1e00-4648-bc0f-8a42d6081305: Your breath weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}8d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} in a 40-foot cone and allows a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} for half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
d2e6df4b-6252-4886-8766-834432a55693: Your breath weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}8d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} in an 80-foot line and allows a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} for half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
13b2a1bc-4fbd-44f4-a996-209fcb5ed6da: Your breath weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}8d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} in a 40-foot cone and allows a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} for half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
c485b55e-3644-45c2-871b-d830fe2f0b9d: Your breath weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}8d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} in an 80-foot line and allows a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} for half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
575e29ee-098a-4709-a308-88906f5b6c6f: Your character gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} every level he gains in his favored class.
0eef4679-babd-4633-b8d3-76db0679c607: Your explorations into the secret mysteries of the world have granted you a preternatural understanding of all things — and you just keep getting smarter. You gain a +1 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} upon taking this revelation and another at every third oracle level gained thereafter.
e5c76d00-c518-42c3-864a-1ed878c38473:
Your face is deformed, as though you were born with a wolf's muzzle instead of an ordinary nose and jaw. Many mistake you for a werewolf, and in areas plagued by lycanthropes, you must take pains to hide your face.
You gain a natural bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} if you are a {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Medium{/g} creature or 1d3 points of damage if you are Small.
All {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast have a 10% chance to fail.
At 5th level, you add magic fang to your list of known spells and your bite damage increases to 1d6 if you are Medium or 1d4 if you are Small.
At 10th level, the damage dealt by your bite attack increases to 1d8 if you are Medium or 1d6 if you are Small.
At 15th level, you add greater magic fang to your list of known spells and the damage dealt by your bite attack increases to 2d6 if you are Medium or 1d8 if you are Small.
5774c10f-acdf-40ac-a202-5d5ef4416a19:
Your faith is your greatest source of protection, and you can use that faith to defend others. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain.
Resistant Touch: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can touch an ally to grant them your resistance bonus for 1 minute. When you use this ability, you lose your resistance bonus granted by the Protection domain for 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
Aura of Protection: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of protection for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You and your allies within this aura gain a +1 deflection bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and resistance 5 against all elements (acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic). The deflection bonus increases by +1 for every four levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th. At 14th level, the resistance against all elements increases to 10. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: protection from {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}, barkskin, protection from energy, communal protection from energy, {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, communal stoneskin, greater {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}restoration{/g}, protection from spells, seamantle.
dd4a2ba4-7e03-4524-b12f-2d9e427961ab:
Your faith is your greatest source of protection, and you can use that faith to defend others. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess.

When you use this ability, you lose your resistance bonus granted by the Protection domain for 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.

The deflection bonus increases by +1 for every four levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th. At 14th level, the resistance against all elements increases to 10. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
9549b71b-ad03-430e-837b-1cda11ff1174:
Your family has always been skilled in the eldritch art of magic. While many of your relatives were accomplished wizards, your powers developed without the need for study and practice. Magic comes naturally to you, but as you gain levels, you must take care to prevent the power from overwhelming you.
Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}Feats{/g} of the Arcane Bloodline: Combat Casting, Improved {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}Initiative{/g}, Iron Will, Reach {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spell{/g}, Skill Focus ({g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_Arcana}Knowledge (arcana){/g}), Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus, Spell Penetration.
64ff62b2-f2a8-4c5f-9956-c0ac96302943: Your form wavers and blurs, granting you 20% {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} until your next turn.
95572af5-74d6-4046-b729-55e2d9176c46:
Your hands and forearms are shriveled and blackened, as if you had plunged your arms into a blazing fire, and your thin, papery skin is sensitive to the touch.
You take a –4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, but you add burning hands to your list of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} known.
At 5th level, add scorching ray and burning arc to your list of spells known.
At 10th level, add fire snake to your list of spells known and your penalty on weapon attack rolls is reduced to –2.
At 15th level, add hellfire ray to your list of spells known.
012d2fcb-6fa3-4ac8-a84e-5ccd55ed4301:
Your heart is cursed with the pull of the Abyss.
Creatures instinctively distrust you, and you take a –3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} when used for diplomacy.
You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on Persuasion skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} when used to intimidate or bluff. Persuasion becomes a class skill for you.
At 5th level, you gain a +4 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fear effects.
At 10th level, you gain immunity to poison.
At 15th level, any weapon you wield is treated as chaotic and evil for the purposes of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
8e7b80fa-f1bb-4026-ba80-ffc6ca9453bf: Your heavenly power derives from insight rather than force of personality.
b4d9282b-f16e-43b5-ab61-6c335a44f79f: Your magic comes from the knowledge and traditions that your bloodline accumulated through the generations, not just from force of personality. You use your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, rather than your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g}, to determine all class features and effects relating to your sorcerer class, such as bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} per day, the maximum spell level you can cast, the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DCs{/g} of your spells, and the number of daily uses of your bloodline powers.
4017d118-dff5-4a75-91f3-fcd0f8e75339: Your next Kinetic Healer ability burn cost is reduced to zero.
60911d7c-dc82-4970-928f-7fed0d4b3859: Your next arcanist {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} makes your enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} two times and take the worse result.
9eedfffb-f748-4021-a351-dea17bf66158: Your next arcanist {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} will have increased {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g}.
4569dea9-5b56-4000-812d-7de3d7491948: Your next negative channel energy or inflict wounds {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is strengthened.
6b3853b6-66c4-4433-8728-341bf7e709de: Your next positive channel energy or cure wounds {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is strengthened.
47e611d4-860a-4f55-8934-03aefac2f61e: Your powers of compulsion can affect even bestial creatures. Whenever you cast a mind-affecting {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, it affects animals, magical beasts, monstrous humanoids, and vermin as if they were humanoids who understood your language.
81518c19-1898-43e6-be29-5b03593a4916:
Your shape changes to that of a large dire bear. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +10 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and two claw attacks (1d6 damage) with the grabber ability. At 8th level, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with your claw attacks. At 15th level, your {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} multiplier with your claw attacks increases by 1 (×2 becomes ×3, for example) up to a maximum of ×4, and you gain the Awesome Blow {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite, claw
595c817d-3407-4a98-ab85-a753b3f322b6:
Your shape changes to that of a large dire boar. While in this form, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a gore {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +10 feet. At 8th level, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with your gore attack, and you gain powerful charge (+1d8 on your gore attack when charging). At 15th level, you gain 1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit point{/g} per shifter level you have, and you gain Awesome Blow as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: gore
48cb0cdf-b4fc-441e-b23b-2333fda1dd14:
Your shape changes to that of a large dire wolf. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +20 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and you can attempt to trip your opponent as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} if you hit them with a bite attack. At 8th level, the range of your scent ability increases to 40 feet, and you gain a +4 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (Nature) checks{/g}. At 15th level, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with your bite attack.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite
e76516e2-786d-43de-9646-52e9e07c5cd9:
Your shape changes to that of a large dire wolverine. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +10 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and two claw attacks (1d8 damage). Additionally, whenever you are dealt damage in combat, you enter a state identical to a barbarian's rage. You can remain in this state for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to 4 + twice your shifter level + your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier. This ability otherwise functions like a barbarian's rage and benefits from rage powers gained from other sources. At 8th level, you can choose two barbarian rage powers, using your shifter level as your effective barbarian level for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites. At 15th level, you are no longer fatigued at the end of your rage.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite, claw
318cefe1-bc3f-4bf3-87f3-fac4ad7daec0:
Your shape changes to that of a large horse. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +20 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), two hoof {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and your attacks deal double damage if used when charging or attempting an overrun {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}maneuver{/g}. At 8th level, you can move through {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatened squares{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}, and you gain the overrun ability. At 15th level, you gain Improved Overrun as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. You do not need to meet the prerequisites for this feat.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: hoof
25544a92-5e98-4743-ae83-75c44ae1499a:
Your shape changes to that of a large lizard. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +10 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), and a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}) with the grabber ability. At 8th level, your speed bonus increases to +30 feet. At 15th level, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with your bite attack.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite
8634e979-d186-4062-bb27-dda8ca6490db:
Your shape changes to that of a large mammoth. While in this form, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a gore {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and two slam attacks (1d8 damage). You also gain a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} and a +2 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. At 8th level, you gain the overrun ability. At 15th level, you gain Bull Rush as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, and your racial bonus to Strength ability score and natural armor bonus to AC increase to +4.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: gore, slam
dcee8c55-eb87-4c82-8c19-e4ead17d379c:
Your shape changes to that of a large tiger. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +10 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), two claw attacks (2d4 damage), the grabber ability with both your bite and claw attacks, and the pounce ability. At 8th level, you gain a +4 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth checks{/g}. At 15th level, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Rake}rake{/g} ability, which uses the damage of your regular claw attacks for the extra claw attacks.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite, claw
22bf70d6-1afa-43e8-9770-7a9368e57777:
Your shape changes to that of a medium dinosaur. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +30 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), two talon attacks (1d8 damage), and the pounce ability. At 8th level, you gain two secondary claw attacks (1d4 damage; these attacks cannot use your shifter claws damage) and a +4 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility checks{/g}. At 15th level, you gain a +2 dodge bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, and you can move through {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatened squares{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite, talon
e88a55c4-1643-4702-a34a-a85abc9b1a47:
Your shape changes to that of a medium spider. While in this form, you gain the tremorsense ability (10 feet), the web special {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, and a bite attack ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}).
Web: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can attempt to wrap a foe in sticky webs as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. If you hit the foe, they are immobilized and entangled. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, the victim can attempt to break free by making a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility check{/g} (the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} with the greater bonus is selected automatically). Both skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} have a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} equal to 10 + half your shifter level + your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier.
At 8th level, you gain a +4 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g}, and the range of your tremorsense ability increases to 20 feet. At 15th level, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with your bite attack, and the range of your tremorsense ability increases to 30 feet.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite
434bbdc2-0445-4e30-8929-71618a927012: Your ties to nature have more to do with creatures than with capriciousness.
81ce5818-6a53-479a-b06e-485e220a79e0: Your touch can fill a creature with lethargy, causing a living creature to become staggered for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. If you touch a staggered living creature, that creature falls asleep for 1 round instead. Undead creatures touched are staggered for a number of rounds equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.[LONGSTART] You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.[LONGEND]
018a9438-ad4e-41cc-8140-0e28a2b4290a:
Your touch can {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} wounds, and your presence instills unity and strengthens emotional bonds.
Calming Touch: You can touch a creature as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} to heal it of {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of damage + 1 point per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. This touch also removes the fatigued, shaken, and sickened conditions (but has no effect on more severe conditions). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
Guarded Hearth: At 8th level, you can create a ward that protects a specified area. Creating this ward is a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}. All friendly creatures in the area receive a resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to your Wisdom modifier on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} and an equal competence bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} while inside the warded area. The ward lasts for 1 hour per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day.
7a0e058a-3b04-4a40-928f-1efd8048bfe9:
Your touch can {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} wounds, and your presence instills unity and strengthens emotional bonds.
Calming Touch: You can touch a creature as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} to heal it of {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of damage + 1 point per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. This touch also removes the fatigued, shaken, and sickened conditions (but has no effect on more severe conditions). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
Guarded Hearth: At 8th level, you can create a ward that protects a specified area. Creating this ward is a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}. All friendly creatures in the area receive a resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to your Wisdom modifier on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} and an equal competence bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} while inside the warded area. The ward lasts for 1 hour per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day.
Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: bless, communal protection from {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}, prayer, communal protection from energy, burst of glory, communal stoneskin, greater restoration, legendary proportions, mass heal.
c6b11baa-543e-4232-b531-26aabf62cba9:
Your touch infuses life and weapons with chaos, and you revel in all things anarchic.
Touch of Chaos: You can imbue a target with chaos as a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. For the next {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, anytime the target {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} a d20, he must roll twice and take the less favorable result. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
Chaos Blade: At 8th level, you can give a weapon you touch the anarchic special weapon quality for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.
Domain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spells{/g}: protection from law, communal protection from law, dispel magic, freedom of movement, acidic spray, banshee blast, word of chaos, cloak of chaos, summon monster IX.
7408ab38-7915-4aa8-9c9a-be1aef1fa7de:
Your touch staves off pain and {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}, and your {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} magic is particularly vital and potent.
Rebuke Death: You can touch a living creature as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, healing it for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of damage plus 1 for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can only use this ability on a creature that is below 0 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
Healer's Blessing: At 6th level, all of your cure {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} are treated as if they were empowered, increasing the amount of damage healed by half (+50%). This does not apply to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt to undead with a cure spell. This does not stack with the Empower Spell metamagic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
Domain Spells: remove sickness, lesser restoration, cure serious wounds, neutralize poison, breath of life, heal, greater restoration, protection from spells, mass heal.
caaf6e20-f221-42a4-9423-c1b07cc7b67d: Your {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spellcasting{/g} is obstructed. To cast a spell, you need to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration check{/g} with 15 + double spell level {g|Encyclopedia:DC}difficulty{/g}.
1dc7c592-ee63-4f4a-8110-7f7b15780554: Zen archers are proficient with longbows, shortbows, composite longbows, and composite shortbows in addition to their normal {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiencies{/g}.
